description: The «My account app» allows you to receive an overview of your invoices and costs while also being able to directly manage your products. Stay informed even when you are on the go! Note: The app is available to Sunrise private customers and small companies from Business Sunrise. Range of features: - Product overview with rate and contract details - Manage options - Invoice overview with payment status and PDF view - Overview of costs since the last invoice - Current prepaid credit and loading options - Included services available - Customer address - Designate favorites - Links (e.g. on Sunrise Roaming Cockpit) Login In order to access your personal data, log in using the following information: - Sunrise mobile, landline, or customer number - Password If you do not know the password, request it at sunrise.ch/myaccount or directly through the app. Rates - Using Sunrise My account is free of charge. - The app's data traffic, over the mobile network in particular, is billed in accordance with the applicable connection rates of your mobile service provider or your Wi-Fi network. - Using the application abroad will result in additional costs due to roaming. Feedback If you discover an error or have other questions about the app, please contact us at app@sunrise.net with your telephone number and the hardware used (e.g. Samsung Galaxy S5). We would be happy to help you further or improve the app. Many thanks for your support! We are of course always very happy to receive positive evaluations or reviews! ;-) We hope you enjoy using the app. Your Sunrise Team
release_text: We are excited to present to you our completely revamped My account app. New features: - Rateplan and contract details - Manage options - Top up prepaid - Designate favorites Feedback If you discover an error or have other questions about the app, please contact us at app@sunrise.net with your telephone number and the hardware used (e.g. Samsung Galaxy S5). We would be happy to help you further or improve the app. Many thanks for your support! We hope you enjoy using the app. Your Sunrise Team

Four in a Line game is classic free puzzle game also known as "Four in a row or Connect 4" and brings a smooth interface and a lot of fun to the player. Our free Four in a Line game offers: ✓ 4 different game levels (game difficulties) ✓ 2 players game (multiplayer) ✓ game statistics The Four in a Line is two-player connection game in which the players take turns dropping colored discs from the top into a 7 column, 6 row grid. The pieces fall down, occupying the next available space within the column. The objective of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before your opponent. The Four in a Line game is a great way to pass your free time. Start playing Four in a Line game on your Android device for free. Get the Four in a Line game now and let the fun begins!

app_name: 電車でとれとれ宅建2014 一問一答
description: 過去問をベースに作成した一問一答式のオリジナル問題1,000問です。 　長年、宅建試験対策講座で教えてきた専門家が、過去の傾向を分析、2014年試験で出題される可能性が高い問題を1,000問収録しました。 　正答率をグラフ化し間違いやすい問題を視覚的に把握、弱点を集中的に復習し、最小限の労力で合格点にたどり着くための問題演習アプリです。 　電車での移動中や休み時間、ちょっとしたスキマ時間を活用して宅建試験にぜひ合格してください。 　◇問題作成 フィナンシャル総合研究所 　◇監修 株式会社FPアルトゥル
release_text: ver1.1.0 (2014/07/17) 問題を2014年版に更新しました。 ver1.0.1 (2013/08/03) 問題522 (宅建業法 第82問) について、正答の誤りを修正いたしました。 合わせて、この問題の履歴をリセットいたしました。 ご迷惑をおかけしたことお詫び申し上げます。

루미키즈 앱북 신데렐라는 기존의 플레이 방식의 보기만 하는 동화가 아닌 아이들이 직접 스토리 진행에 참여하도록 유도 하는 인터렉티브 동화 어플리케이션 입니다. 다양한 터치 이벤트, 터치시 말하기, 장면전환, 진동 피드백, 터치시 변신, 구두신기기, 말 달리기, 그림 기억 퍼즐 게임 등 다양한 기능을 담았습니다. (주)모겐토는 교육컨텐츠 및 이러닝 (E-learning)전문 업체로서 우리 아이들의 정서발달 및 지능발달에 도움이 될 수 있는 교육적이고 좋은 컨텐츠를 만들어 내기 위해 관련 전문인력으로 연구개발팀을 구성 다양한 교육 컨텐츠를 연구개발 하고 있습니다. 유아 동화 어플리케이션 를 출시하게 되었습니다. 현재 한국어 버젼으로 등록되었으나 영어 및 중국어 등 외국어 학습 요소를 추가한 업그레이드 버젼을 준비 중입니다. 그외 다른 많은 명작 동화 스토리를 개성있고 아기자기한 예쁜 그림 스타일로 담아내려고 준비 중에 있으며, 아이들이 흥미를 갖게하는 학습게임 및 재미있는 기능들도 추가하려고 합니다. 개선된 많은 신규 작품이 빨리 출시될 수 있도록 여러분의 많은 기대와 호응 부탁드립니다. *^^* 사운드 소스 제공 : 에코노베이션 ---- 개발자 연락처 : +82234613934

description: Spark Art is a whole new way to doodle, brought to you by the creators of "Fireworks Arcade"! Spark Art is a fun-filled app for all ages! Paint original, sparkling creations, and save or share your work. Tap or drag to draw shapes, words, or objects that automatically come to life with dynamic, physics-based animations. Vary your strokes and speed to create interesting patterns and effects. Or just watch a display of sample art. Spark your imagination! *** Features *** * Simple drawing for all ages - Tap to create bursts of sparks - Drag to create animated paths - Shake to erase - Press the pause icon to show options - Save creations to your device's photo Gallery * Advanced drawing techniques - Multi-touch enabled - Experiment with strokes, speed, and timing - Draw while paused to synchronize effects * Effects and more - Great burst and sizzle sound effects - Tilt to control gravity - Over 50 sample drawings included Enjoy. Version history: 1.0 - Initial release Please send any issues or feedback to: support@bigduckgames.com

The Official Android App Of Flowdock Flowdock is your team inbox with chat. It replaces Skype, IM or IRC chat in your team's workflow and frees your mailbox from automated emails. With integrations to over 50 tools, you’ll always stay up-to-date with what your team is doing. The Flowdock Android app lets you tap into your flows using your Android device. You can chat with your teams, browse your team inbox, upload images and keep up with discussions. NOTE: To use the Flowdock app, you need to have a Flowdock account available at: http://www.flowdock.com Flowdock integrates with your favorite tools, including Trello, Git & GitHub, Pivotal Tracker, Zendesk, Atlassian JIRA, Confluence, Bamboo, Capistrano, Heroku, Redmine, FogBugz, Basecamp, BitBucket, Kiln, Mercurial, Nagios, Pingdom, Hudson / Jenkins and many other project management, issue tracking, wiki, version control, monitoring, deployment & continuous integration systems and services. For feedback, bug reports or feature suggestions, check out our Uservoice page at http://flowdock.uservoice.com
release_text: * Possibility to add and remove tags from messages * New context action dialog * Performance improvements with app loading and chat scrolling * Fixed occasional 1-to-1 real time issues * Fixed a bug where a some threads opened from "Notifications" wouldn't render correctly * Fixed broken rendering of certain Inbox messages

A live wallpaper app for all deer hunting lover or deer hunter! This live wallpaper consists of 15 different deers, which include a white tailed buck, black tailed deer, chital deer, elk deer, fallow deer, hog deer, moose deer, mule deer, muntjac deer, red deer, roe deer fawn, sambar deer, sika deer, water deer and a white tailed fawn! The deers are presented in a stylish and 3D animated cube, with different optional background effect! There are many options for you to change so that you could create lots of different styles for your home screen. The possibilities is only limited by your own creativity! List of features:- * Double tap screen to toggle animation style * Tap screen once to change view depth * Multiple theme * Change lighting color * Dynamic lighting color * Moving light * Use own image as theme * Set rotation speed * Set loop circle speed * Framing option * Multiple background particle effect * Support phone and tablet * Support portrait and landscape mode With nearly 20 different setting options, we are sure you can customize this deer hunter live wallpaper to something that deer hunter will really love! Please note that this is a free preview version. Some screenshots and features listed here are only available for full version.

**This is a skin for Better Keyboard or Smart Keyboard .** **How to use** Install Better Keyboard or Smart Keyboard from the market-> Open Better Keyboard->Press Better Keyboard Skin -> choose skin and select it from the list.

BeeCells Lite is a highly enjoyable game. Once you start, you won’t want to stop. Try it, and see how high you can score. The goal is to group six or more balls of the same color together. Once the balls are grouped, your score increases, and the grouped balls disappear to make room for more maneuvers. After each turn, your device puts more balls on the board and your task becomes more difficult. The game is over when the board completely fills up. PLEASE BUY FULL VERSION! Why to buy the full version? Full version has: -- Colorblind mode. Use fruits and flowers instead of balls. Kids love this too! -- Better Scoring! You are given higher score if you remove more colors at once! -- Multiple background textures!

Screen Time Parental Control ScreenTime Control is a parent control app that allows you to monitor and manage the time spent on family's tablets and phones. ScreenTime of Parental Control has the background monitor to check up the time usage and let parents easily control how long your kids can use his/her tablet or phone. When screen time is runout, your kids has to bring the device to you for unlock or recharge more time. FEATURES • One click setup screen time • Device Level lock down after screen time is run out • Daily time limits on phone or device usage • Password protected for application uninstall Parental control, screen time management, screen time parental control We would like to hear from you Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Trustlook Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/trustlook

At MathDoku you can play this highly addicting logic and math puzzle game. It is available in both online and printable formats for free. Are you up for the challenge? The games at MathDoku are is loosely similar to killer sudoku, It is also slightly similar to a crossword or jigsaw puzzle since it requires trial and error to solve. The games at MathDoku are available in 3 formats, a 4x4, 6x6, and 8x8 and difficulties ranging between easy, medium, hard, and no-op. key word: Mathdoku, Sudoku, kendoku, ken ken, square wisdom, minuplu, calcudoku, latincalc

description: ai.type is the smartest, most personalized keyboard for smartphones and tablets. With over 25 million users worldwide, we transform the messaging experience. Our app lets you type better and faster by learning your writing style, it allows you to customize and personalize your keyboard any way you like. *** Please note that premium features (prediction, completion, correction, swiping, emoji) will be disabled after 10 days. You can continue and use our fully functional free keyboard for as long as you like. ★ Feature-set highlights ★ Design keyboard layout, change themes, colors, fonts, use more than 800 emoji, and express yourself exactly the way you want to. ★New features★ ★ Thousands of free themes – Choose any of the free and attractive keyboard themes out of thousands available themes as part of our Theme Market . ★ Design and share your own theme – o Design personalized themes (background, colors, fonts and beyond), o 💫 Share theme with friends and Upload theme to our app Theme Market where millions of other users can see, rate and ⬇ download them. ★ Auto suggested Emojis 🙏🚄💑, and a scrollable 😄 layout  o Let us help and suggest the right Emoji based on the words you use and context 😍🍩.  o Enjoy our new Emoji scrollable layout helping you to easily navigate through a complete Emoji pack (>800). ★ New Lollipop (Android L) Material design & new Material Keyboard. ★ Improved correction-prediction . ★ Simplified Chinese and 13 new languages. ★ Additional functionality★  ● Next Word Prediction, Completion & Auto-Correction – Context based next word prediction and auto-correction (including Grammar Check in English) based on your own unique writing style.  ● Swipe – Write faster by swiping your finger from key to key.  ● Personalize 🔧 your keyboard's look & feel, functionality and create your own custom keys & shortcuts.   o Dynamically resize your keyboard size according to your needs.   o Set ANY image as your background image.   o Use our top (5th) row to efficiently add numbers, punctuation (and other) characters, from within the primary keyboard screen.   o Long-press any key and conveniently use accented and alternative characters.  ● On-keyboard search 🔎 to help you find text instantly.  ● Voice Narration – Dictates 🔊 the words as you type them.  ● Privacy – Your privacy is our main concern. We will never share your data or learn from password fields. Text stays encrypted and private. ★Language Support★ Afrikaans, Albanian (Shqip), Arabic (العربية), Armenian (Հայերեն), Azerbaijani (azərbaycan dili), Belarusian (беларуская мова), Bengali (বাংলা), Bulgarian (български език), Catalan (català), Chinese (中国简化), Croatian (hrvatski jezik), Czech (čeština), Danish (dansk), Dutch (Nederlands), English, Estonian (eesti), Finnish (suomi), French (français), Georgian (ქართული), German (Deutsch), Greek (ελληνικά), Hebrew (עברית), Hindi (हिन्दी, हिंदी), Hungarian (magyar), Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia), Italian (italiano), Kannada (ಕನ್ನಡ), Korean (한국어, 조선어), Latvian (latviešu valoda), Lithuanian (lietuvių kalba), Macedonian (македонски јазик), Norwegian (Norsk), Persian (فارسی), Polish (polszczyzna), Portuguese (português), Punjabi (ਪੰਜਾਬੀ, پنجابی‎), Romanian (limba română), Russian (русский), Serbian (српски језик), Slovak (slovenčina), Slovene (slovenščina), Spanish (español), Swahili (Kiswahili), Swedish (Svenska), Tagalog, Tamil, Telugu, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese ★Support & Questions ★ Visit our Help & FAQ pages to find videos, answers & tips, and open a support request: http://www.aitype.com/support/ You can also visit us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/aitype .

Flow. A magazine that takes its time Celebrating creativity, imperfection, and life's little pleasures. Flow is a magazine for women who live busy yet happy lives, and who want to make different kinds of choices. They enjoy making things by hand, practical philosophy, positive psychology, and living in the moment. The best things in life happen when you follow your instincts. That’s how Flow was created, too. In each printed issue, we add paper goodies, such as special notebooks, handy calendars, or coloring pages for grown ups. Flow is for paper lovers! So why have a digital version? Because we believe we can have the best of both worlds. In our digital version, we offer samples of some of the inspiring articles from our magazine, along with great video clips, links to our favorite blogs, and eye-catching illustrations that’ll give you the same good vibe as our magazine. You can order our print edition at flowmagazine.com/order. Flow ® is a trademark of Sanoma Media Netherlands B.V. © Sanoma Media Netherlands B.V.

description: =================================================IMPORTANT: CLZ Music is NOT a stand-alone app! This is an add-on for Music Collector for PC or Mac. (available for $29.95 here: http://www.collectorz.com/music/ ) You need Music Collector to catalog your music collection and EXPORT data and images to this CLZ Music for Android. ** Without Music Collector, this app is useless! ** ============================================================== Are you using Collectorz.com's Music Collector to catalog your personal music collection? Then CLZ Music is a great companion, to browse, sort and search your music collection (and your wish list!) on your Android device. Just use the Export to CLZ Music feature in Music Collector to export your existing database (including images) to this Android app. Features: * Import your collection data and images from the Windows or Mac edition - Use Wi-Fi to transfer directly from Windows or Mac to your iPhone. - Or: Export to a file in the Win/Mac version, then copy the file to your Android's SD card. * Browse your In Collection items, your Wish List, or your entire database, using the 3 main tabs on the top left: All, Collection, Wish List * View your album lists in 2 different views: - List : showing a small cover image, artist, title, year, index nr & status. - Thumbnail Wall: just cover image thumbnails, but lots of em. * Sort your album lists by Artist, Title, Year, Index, asc. or desc. * Search your database by Artist, Title, Track Title or Barcode * Group your items into folders. Choose from: Artist, Genre, Composer, Label, Year, Format, Location, Rating and more... * Tap an album in any view to go to the Album Details page: - Cover image, artist, title, track list, etc.. and your personal information. - Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next album, or just swipe. - Shake iPhone to go to a random album in your current list. - Choose from 4 styles: Blue, Black, Orange, White * Tap small cover image on Details Page to go the Large Cover Page: - Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next album, or just swipe. - Tap the image to return to Details Page. * Supports Portrait and Landscape modes in all views and pages. REQUIREMENTS: - Music Collector 9.2 for Windows (or newer). or - Music Collector 3.4 for Mac OS X (or newer) RECOMMENDED (needed to transfer data over Wi-Fi): - Wi-Fi connection to the same local network that your desktop computer is in. - Apple Bonjour service.

description: Make your dear baby sleep like a lion by using 'Lion Lullaby Music for Kids' when it's time to go to bed. This free mobile app includes some of the most beautiful sleep sounds for babies that will provide your kid with sweet dreams all night long. Get it now and a crying baby sound will no longer be a problem for you! Enjoy greatest lullaby songs with lyrics and sleep better! - Songs for kids on your mobile phone! - Perfect sound to sleep to! - Set time interval or let it sing constantly until your children fall asleep! - These beautiful baby lullabies will help your child sleep like an angel! - "How do I get a baby to sleep" is a question that will never pop in your mind again! 'Lion Lullaby Music for Kids' is the best free application on the market that you and your children will simply adore! Whenever it's bed time, just play some of the lullaby songs for toddlers included in the app and lull your children in no time. These are some of the most beautiful and effective sounds for relaxation that your kids will easily get accustomed to and will love them throughout the entire childhood. This great lullaby music will secure sweet dreams all night. We know that listening to certain types of relaxing music can help adults calm themselves, too. We also know that singing promotes relaxation in adults, and may ease many of these negative emotions. Singing to your child, with or without the assistance of a recording, can improve the emotional state of both you and your baby. By engaging in bedtime songs, infants learn auditory patterns like rhythm and phrasing, which support the learning of sentence structure. It may provide comfort during unpleasant routines, and can help establish positive routines. Baby's sleep will be much better if it is stimulated by "lullaby songs". With this great music app a crying baby sound will become just an unpleasant memory for stressed parents. Nursery rhymes are a great way to introduce your newborns to the world of music. A newborn sleep is of crucial importance in its early age, so use the chance to provide it with some of the best sounds to fall asleep. Download 'Lion Lullaby Music for Kids' and enjoy listening to greatest children songs. This is also great music for preschoolers and all sleeping children. Songs for toddlers and nursery rhymes for infants will provide your infants with sweet dreams any time. Rock your baby and wish it a good night! All infants will adore these beautiful sounds for relaxing! Hush little baby and have a good night! Ads information: ============= 'Lion Lullaby Music for Kids' is a free and ad supported app. When you install it, the shortcut icons to this free and ad sponsored app may be created on your background. You are able to remove them whenever you want without affecting the application itself. You may also get some notifications in your system tray about new free apps. In order to avoid them, you can chose to opt out at http://www.airpush.com/optout and http://opt.leadbolt.com/ or do it directly from the application where it is available. Legal info: ===== This is a free application. Songs are originally designated to lull a child to sleep and they are believed to be in a public domain. If you are an author of a song or you are aware that copyright belongs to a commercial author, please report to us immediately. Thank you!

Political Digest brings you the latest and the most relevant political news, hand picked and curated by Memeorandum.com, the world's most popular political news aggregation service, that gives you multiple angles of the same story. For thousands of people, the day starts with Memeorandum.com. And now Political Digest makes sure your favorite political news site is available in its truest form on your phones and tablets, with added features such as notification, news widget and more. Even if you don't have time to go through the news, Political Digest has a radio function that will read out the news for you. Features: ★ Scalable design - for both phones and tablets (for 7" like the Nexus 7 in particular) ★ Top News section - that shows only the most relevant news ★ River section - featuring all news stories ★ History tab - that provides a searchable list of your reading history ★ Radio - reads news out for you and can be accessed outside the app with widget ★ Color change - for news titles to indicate a story that has been read (similar to link color in web browsers) ★ Notifications - for top news only ★ Widget - that displays all stories from River section ★ Control the notification, set the refresh rate, ringtone, vibration, LED light and more What differentiates Political Digest from other similar apps is that you get to read multiple angles of the same report, from different sources. In politics you can never get the complete picture by going through just one source. And that is where Political Digest comes in. For example if the same news appears at New York Times, Politico, Washington Post, CNN and BBC, Political Digest displays prominently only the first site that was to report that news, groups the rest of the sites into a collection and hides it from the main view. Alternate sources of the same news can be accessed by clicking the "Discussion" button. And when one or more news items are related, they are properly grouped like on the Memeorandum website. Author names (when available) are also properly mentioned just above the story title (like Alex Altman / Wall Street Journal, John Roberts / Reuters, Jason Smith / Associated Press), so that you can easily identify your favorite reporter's works. With Democratic Barack Obama - Joe Biden getting a second term in the White House, what could be the Republican agenda for Mitt Romney and Paul Ryan? What could be the world-wide impact of the public uproar in dictator led Asian regions? Download Political Digest today and have your daily dose of relevant political news, from multiple angles, in its most complete form. Permission Explained:- READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY permission is used to stop the radio when you receive an incoming call. Otherwise the radio will continue playing and you won't be able to hear your caller. Disclaimer:- Political Digest is in no way affiliated with Memeorandum.com. We love Memeorandum and wanted to provide the best user experience for the site, on phones and tablets. We do believe nothing can match the convenience of visiting Memeorandum.com directly when using a PC and would recommend you to do so. But when you are on the go, Political Digest will come in handy. All icon copyrights belong to the respective sites.

description: PebbleApps is a set of useful applets for your Pebble SmartWatch. As of version 0.3, it features 5 applets : - Weather : 7-day weather forecast * OpenWeatherMaps * Yahoo! Weather - SMS : * Full access to your SMS Inbox * Answer with canned messages - Agenda : Upcoming Agenda events (Android 4.0+ only) - Utils applet : * Phone battery and network info * Find my phone * Remote camera shutter * Request weather data refresh - Any.DO : Browse your tasks from your Pebble This application will let you browse your content quickly and smoothly with a list based UI and complete detail screens. Unlike most other watchapps, content is not limited to a few recent items, but is streamed to your watch on the fly. The application is translated in english and partially in french. description: Gérez vos comptes à distance du bout des doigts grâce à une application simple, pratique et sécurisée. TABLEAU DE BORD - Découvrez le tableau de bord de votre application que vous pouvez personnaliser et organiser selon vos besoins (solde de vos comptes principaux, encours Carte Bancaire, nouveaux messages, coordonnées de votre conseiller…). - Déplacez, ajoutez, supprimez ou modifiez la taille des tuiles afin de créer votre tableau de bord. ACCES RAPIDE - Profitez pleinement de votre application Caisse d’Epargne en activant la fonctionnalité « Accès rapide » afin de consulter instantanément les informations essentielles de votre compte. Vous visualiserez, à chaque ouverture de votre application, sans ressaisie de votre mot de passe, les informations de votre tableau de bord. L’accès aux autres informations/fonctionnalités (autres comptes, virements, crédits…) reste soumis à la saisie de votre mot de passe. SOLDES, HISTORIQUES ET VIREMENTS - Consultez et gérez vos comptes en temps réel. - Accès aux prélèvements à venir. - Suivez le détail de votre portefeuille titres avec une ventilation par catégorie de valeurs (actions, obligations, OPCVM…). - Effectuez tous vos virements immédiats ou différés. - Réalisez rapidement votre virement le plus fréquent directement depuis votre tableau de bord. - Envoyez votre RIB par e-mail. CREDITS - Consultez le détail de vos crédits détenus (immobilier, consommation). - Consultez votre disponible de crédit renouvelable IZICARTE/TEOZ et demandez un financement ou remboursement anticipé. ASSURANCES - Consultez le détail de vos assurances détenues (automobile, Habitation, Protection juridique...). CONSEILLER ET AGENCES - Utilisez la messagerie sécurisée pour communiquer avec votre conseiller ou votre agence. - Appelez directement votre conseiller ou votre agence. - Retrouvez les coordonnées des agences et distributeurs automatiques Caisse d'Epargne les plus proches. DIVERS - Réalisez vos simulations Crédit et Epargne. - Retrouvez tous les numéros utiles d'assistance et les informations nécessaires pour faire opposition. L’application Caisse d’Epargne est un service gratuit. Le service est ouvert aux particuliers et aux professionnels. **************************************************** Informations sur les autorisations Android lors du téléchargement de l’application : - Photos/ Contenus multimédias/ Fichiers : nécessaire pour la géolocalisation des agences et des distributeurs sur Google maps. Les dernières versions de Google maps peuvent enregistrer des portions de carte sur la carte mémoire du Smartphone pour pourvoir les restituer par la suite sans connexion. - Etat et identité du téléphone : permet d’identifier le téléphone de manière unique et de renvoyer votre tableau de bord personnalisé. - Position approximative (réseau) et précise (GPS) : permet de trouver les agences/distributeurs les plus proches. - Lire / Modifier les contacts : permet d’enregistrer la carte de visite de son conseiller dans les Contacts du téléphone. - Lire/ Modifier le journal d’appel : Lorsqu’on active l’autorisation « Lire / Modifier les contacts », Android active automatiquement cette autorisation. Le journal d’appel n’est pas utilisé. - Afficher les connexions réseaux -> permet d’accéder à Internet. - Récupérer les applications en cours d’exécution : Permet de gérer la navigation entre applications (multitâches) et de vérifier, lors du retour sur l’application Banque, que votre session est encore active, à défaut l’application vous redemandera une authentification. Manage your accounts remotely fingertips with a simple, convenient and secure. SCOREBOARD - Discover the dashboard of your application that you can customize and organize your needs (balance of your key accounts, outstanding Bankcard, new messages, contact your advisor ...). - Move, add, delete, or change the size of the tiles to create your dashboard. QUICK - Enjoy your savings bank enforcement by turning on "Quick Links" to instantly see the essential information for your account. You will see, every time you open your application without re-entering your password, the information in your dashboard. Access to other information / features (other accounts, transfers, credits ...) is subject to enter your password. BALANCES HISTORICAL AND TRANSFERS - Access and manage your accounts in real time. - Access to future withdrawals. - Follow the details of your securities portfolio with a breakdown by category of securities (stocks, bonds, mutual funds ...). - Make all your immediate or delayed transfers. - Quickly Realize your most frequent transfer directly from your dashboard. - Please send your bank details via email. CREDITS - Check the details of your credits held (real consumption). - Consult your available revolving credit IZICARTE / TEOZ and ask for a pre-funding or reimbursement. INSURANCE - Check the details of your owned insurance (car, home, legal protection ...). ADVISOR AND AGENCIES - Use the secure messaging to communicate with your counselor or agency. - Directly call your advisor or agency. - Find contact information for auto dealerships and distributors Caisse d'Epargne closest. MISCELLANEOUS - Make your simulations Credit and Savings. - Find all the useful numbers for assistance and information to opposition. The Caisse d'Epargne application is a free service. The service is open to individuals and professionals. ************************************************** ** Information about permissions when downloading Android app: - Photos / Multimedia content / Files: necessary for geolocation agencies and distributors on Google maps. The latest versions of Google maps can record card on the Smartphone portions of the memory card filled restore them later without connection. - State and phone identity: used to identify uniquely the phone and send your personalized dashboard. - Approximate location (network) and precise (GPS): Locates agencies / closest distributors. - Read / Edit contacts: save the adviser of his business card in Contacts on the phone. - Read / Change the call log: When active the permission "Read / Edit contacts" Android automatically activates the authorization. The call log is not used. - View network connections -> to access the Internet. - Retrieve running applications: Manage navigation between applications (multitasking) and to check on the return on bank application, your session is still active, if the application again prompt you authentication.
release_text: Pour les possesseurs d’une montre connectée Android Wear, l’application "Banque" Caisse d’Epargne sera automatiquement installée, avec les fonctionnalités suivantes : - Solde de vos 2 comptes favoris avec votre encours CB (comptes sélectionnés dans Accès rapide de l’application Smartphones), - 3 dernières opérations de ses 2 comptes, - Nombre de nouveau(x) message(s) de votre Messagerie. Corrections de bugs et dysfonctionnements remontés par les utilisateurs (authentification, crashs...).

description: This is the Lite version of the internationally successful Carp Fishing by Clear Fishing. Here we offer you 34 articles on: rigs, knots, baits, hooks, lines, end tackle etc. The complete version of Carp Fishing by Clear fishing is sold in 7 languages and 52 countries, and is the most comprehensive carp fishing guide currently available in the major app stores. The app covers all important aspects of carp fishing: rig construction and applicability, knots, hook patterns, lead systems, baits and hookbaits, rods and reels, fishing lines, accessories, rod pods and bite alarms, bivvies (tents) and beds, mats and sacks, baiting and fishing techniques, tips and tricks etc. Carp Fishing aims to present all essential information in order to successfully capture capital carp. Guided by this app, an absolute beginner will be able to build up a tackle box, select and tie reliable hooks, construct rigs, choose an inspired bait and hookbait and target the capital carp. Intermediate anglers will gain new insights allowing them to approach field situations more efficiently. Carp Fishing was developed by European carping experts, journalists and programmers. Rigs : The large number of rigs presented by carping magazines were trimmed down by our specialists to 10 essential rigs that practically cover all carp fishing situations: The Basic (Simple) Hair Rig, The Snowman Rig, The Combi Rig, The Blowback Rig, The MaggotRig, The D Rig, The 360 Degree Rig, Chod Rig, Zig Rig and KD Rig. Clear instructions and photos show you how to correctly construct each rig and tell you how to use it. Following updates will add derivative or highly specialized rigs. Lead Systems: This section teaches you how to select and construct the appropriate lead system, be it The Lead Clip System (a.k.a. The Semi-fixed Lead System, The Safety Clip System), The Helicopter (Chod) System or The In-line Lead System. There are many lead systems advocated on the market, but most of them are variations to the ones named above. Updates will present these variations as well. Knots: The main 9 types of knots used in carp fishing: The Knotless Knot, The Improved Clinch Knot, The Albright Knot, The Grinner Knot, The Palomar Knot, The Trilene Knot, The Uni Knot, The Dropper Knot and The Blood Knot. Baits and Hookbaits: All major types of baits and hookbaits, from pellets and boilies to particles (seeds) and bloodworms are presented with the details of applicability and the main brands. Hook Patterns: The following hook patterns, their corresponding characteristics, applicability and major brands are presented: Curve Shank, Long Shank, Wide Gap, Choddy and Curve Long Shank. Fishing Lines: Strengths and weaknesses, applicability, major brands and price range for: Main Lines, Rig Lines, Braided Coated Lines, Soft Braids, Monofilaments, Fluorocarbons, Leadcores, Leader Lines and others. Leads: Information and applicability of: Grippa Leads, In-line Distance Leads, Pendant Distance Leads etc. Rods: Types of rods used in carp fishing, their main characteristics (action, power and length) explained, and advice on brands, price range and which type of rod should you choose. Reels: Reel components (hot spots with photo close-ups), characteristics, brands and price range. Accessories Accessories used in carp rigging: Swivels and Rig Rings, Clips, Stick Needle and Bait Stoppers, PVA, Tungsten Putty, Rig Wallet etc. Bivvies, Beds and Sleeping Bags: How to choose your camping equipment, what brands are on the market and which is the price range. Baiting and Fishing Techniques: This is a section useful for preparing a carp session or looking for new ideas while fishing. Tips and Tricks A high degree of persuasion was employed to extract these advices from our specialists. Follow them to succeed! Carp Fishing by Clear Fishing was developed in Europe. For more information please visit: http://clearfishing.com

Epic Arena is a free-to-play turn-based 3D strategy board game that plays like a combat action video game. Deploy your units, power them up, and defeat your opponent in epic two-player matches. Join the arena now! Epic Arena’s 3D graphics and bone crunching sound effects will excite your senses. The tactical gameplay will challenge your mind and test your wits. Engage in thrilling cross platform games in Blitz Mode against other players or maintain multiple matches at once in asynchronous Duel Mode. Epic Arena is easy to learn but hard to master. Start playing in minutes! Try the single player puzzle Missions to train your tactical muscles and learn winning strategies. Fine-tune your strategies by challenging friends. Or engage in ranked matches to climb the ladder of the game’s best players. Play from everywhere, anytime on any device. Epic Arena provides a true cross-platform experience. Epic Arena is free-to-play. Unlock or purchase additional teams to master your strategies. Acquire Power Cards and use their special tactics against your opponents. Either way, you're guaranteed to have fun! Key Features: • Free-to-Play turn-based 3D strategy board game. • Competitive play against your friends and players around the world. • 3 Teams: Legion of Chaos, Brotherhood of Order, and Pirates of Tortuga Bay, all featuring unique units, spells, and team traits. • 2 game modes: Duel Mode (asynchronous play) and Blitz Mode (time-limited turn synchronous play). • An array of situational use Power Cards, granting unlimited tactical options. • Cross-platform play: play from everywhere, anytime on any device.
release_text: Introducing the coolest game mode on Epic Arena ever - Real Time Blitz! No more waiting, now you can see every enemy's move literally right away. The best game experience on arena you've ever had! Go ahead, try it!

Dolphin Browser extension for the award-winning LastPass password manager. Fast, easy and simple; securely syncs your passwords across all your browsers and devices. Key Features: - Built-in browser that will automatically fill your login information for each of your saved LastPass sites. - Automatically fill forms on all sites. - Secure Password Generator. - Add, update, and delete Secure Notes and Sites. * 14-day free trial, requires $1/month LastPass Premium subscription afterwards. Allows you to utilize Dolphin Browser instead of or in addition to the LastPass browser/app for Android. Use the Toolbar icon under 'Menu' in Dolphin to see it! Note: LastPass runs in the same process as Dolphin, so applications that monitor data usage combine the usage of LastPass with the usage of Dolphin itself. These applications also often display the LastPass icon instead of the Dolphin icon, causing it to look at first glance like LastPass is using a great deal of data, when in reality Dolphin is using most of the data.
release_text: v3.1.3 * Resolved: Form fill not working v3.1.2 * New: Preferences to logoff when screen turns off or device is locked (LastPass button -> My LastPass Vault -> Menu -> Preferences)

description: eStandards is designed to provide easy and quick access to the California State Standards. This app includes the: • K-12 Common Core State Standards (CCSS) for English Language Arts (ELA) & Literacy and Mathematics The CCSS are organized by content area, grade, strand/domain, and standard. • English Language Development (ELD) standards The ELD standards are organized by grade, part, and proficiency level. • Next Generation Science Standards (NGSS) The NGSS are arranged in a coherent manner across disciplines and grades. This comprehensive app includes the following unique features: •Search by keyword • Save favorite standards • View ELD Standards with CCSS ELA & Literacy correspondences • View CCSS connections with the Next Generation Science Standards (NGSS) • View CCSS ELA & Literacy with College & Career Readiness (CCR) Anchor Standards and corresponding ELD Standards • Access recommended websites and downloadable resources eStandards is a great app for teachers, administrators, and parents!
release_text: Added Search field to ELD, NGSS & Mathematics Fixed misc bugs.

developer: The Modern Pen and Paper Company, LLC
description: X3 Elite is your fully functional P90x3 digital notebook. Own it! Track it! Print it! Embrace Technology! Stay Mobile! Includes Classic*, Lean*, Mass, Doubles*, and Elite Schedules! *includes a separate complex schedule for bonus workouts. X3 Elite was designed with a simple, easy to use, interface which will let you Focus on your workout! A bright exciting look - No dark depressing black background in this app! X3 Elite features include (but not limited to) - Your Next Workout is... X3 Elite will remind you. Option to set reminder. - Your Profile will show Your Next Workout, percent completed, and current program. - Track your workout dates not calendar days (Life happens! Bend your schedule don't break it!) - Are you following the modifiers? Track it! Intensity Level Normal, Modified, Mixed Some days you have to modify to stay in the game. You are still moving forward :) - Add a note, a Focus Point (yeah that's my phrase) to each workout. Rough day? Bad recup?. - Rate the difficulty level of workout.. - Track the time you performed the workout. Ability to split double workouts days into AM/PM. - View or export Fitness Reports for measurements and fit tests. Track your progress with Focus Points*: - Add photos to every measurement day! - Record your measurements: Weight (Chest, Arm, Waist, Hips, Thigh) - Total Measurements: Automatically calculates/tracks measurements to show overall change. *All measurements should be whole numbers or numeric decimal only - no commas. 25.00 not 25,00 - having trouble filtering some European keyboards. - Share your progress!!! email/txt, etc., Be proud of your work! *Focus Points is one of our inside app apps :) - a mini app if you will. - future features will be decided by your feedback. ***Initial database install could take up to 25 seconds (pause) on older devices. It took 15 seconds on my Samsung Note 3. I will be working on this. This is only on the initial install.*** If you have an exceptionally long install (pause of accepting User Agreement) click on Focus Points. If you have more than 8 items in Focus Points please clear app cache and clear data, accept user agreement again (pause) and everything should be fine. Please email me if you have any questions, comments, or concerns - Tony X3 Elite is NOT a finished product. Fitness Reports will include the option to generated P90X3 Worksheets from your data, and eventually a complete report of your journey. Future releases will include a better install, start over process, and reports. Weight Tracker v1.1 included! - yes, another mini apps :) - a digital weight diary. - add your weight any time you want. - include a quick diary note with each measurement. - generate and export your weight report Permission: Write access to external storage is needed to create a "X3Elite" folder and export your Fitness Reports and other data reports to this folder. Vibration access is for reminder notification option. Languages: - English - Spanish (~95% translated). Includes Fitness Reports. *Me disculpo si la traducción no es correcto. Keywords: #FocusT25 #Insanity #MyInsanity #My Insanity #Beachbody #TurboFire #T25 #Shaun T #Focus #Note 2 #Weight Tracker diary #Chalean Extreme #Charlene Johnson #Tapout Tracker XT2 #Tapout #Brazil Butt Lift #Leandro Carvalho #X3 Elite #P90X #P90X2 #P90X3 The Modern Pen and Paper Company™ Creating apps that save more than time! The Modern Pen and Paper Company™ (X3 Elite, Focus T25 Notebook, Focus T25 Note 2, TurboFire Notebook, MyInsanity, Chalean Extreme Notebook, Bum Bum, and Tapout Tracker XT2) is not affiliated with Beachbody, LLC or any of their business entities. Please see Beachbody.com for their company overview. This statement does not remove our shared passion for a healthier you! If you have a suggestion for a feature let us know. Any questions, suggestions, or comments please email me!
release_text: v1.32 - re-branding - added groundwork for new features v1.31 - New Feature for resistance band users!

description: Telefonun arka planında açık kalan ve hafızayı gereksiz kullanan uygulamaları kapatarak şarjınızın daha uzun süre gitmesini ve telefonunuzun yavaşlamasını engeller. Neden 'Otomatik Sonlandırıcı''ya İhtiyaç Duyarım? - Bazı oyunlar ve uygulamalar siz kapatsanız bile arka planda açık kalır. Bu da telefonunuzun hafızasında belli bir yer tutar ve telefonunuzun yavaşlamasına neden olur. Aynı zamanda açık kalan uygulamalar devamlı telefonunuzun şarjını tüketir. "Auto task killer" sizin belirlediğiniz uygulamaların arka planda açık kalmasını engeller. Her bir görev sonlandırımında size hafızada açılan alanı bildirir. Ayrıca "Auto Task Killer" telefonunuzda çok az yer kaplar ve çok az yorar. Auto Task Killer Özellikleri Nelerdir? - Telefonunuzdaki tüm uygulamaları listeleme ve sıralama özelliği, - Telefon hafızasındaki uygulamaların kapladığı alanı ve ne kadar boş alan kaldığını gösterme özelliği, - Ayarlar menüsünden "Auto Task Killer" etkinleştirme seçeneği, - Telefon açıldığında otomatik "Auto Task Killer" uygulamasını başlatma seçeneği, - Seçilen uygulamalar ya da tüm uygulamaları sonlandırma seçeneği, - Görevleri ya da tüm işlemleri sonlandırma seçeneği, - Hafızanın kullanım oranına göre sonlandırma seçeneği. Örn : %80 i seçerseniz telefon hafızasının %80 i aşıldığında otomatik olarak seçilen kriterlere göre arka planda açık olan görevler sonladırılır. - 5, 10, 30 ya da 60 sn aralıklarla uygulama sonlandırma seçeneği, - Sonlandırma sonucunda hafızada boşaltılan alanı bildirme seçeneği, Uygulamayı iyileştirebilmemiz için gördüğünüz eksikleri, fikirlerinizi bize mail atınız.

description: Designed for phones and tablets, AIO Widgets provides several customizable widgets to enhance your device homescreen. EGGGZ is amazing eggs-catching game. Tap chickens to help the guy to catch eggs. You have several lives. Each broken egg takes one life. You lose if you spend the last life. The game has: - 50 missions - special missions - unlimited Championship mode with online Leaderboard ***Campaign Mode*** Pass missions of the Campaign and earn golden eggs. Tap a mission, read the description and play! Missions differ by aim and initial conditions. In the beginning of the Campaign you have a simple farm. It's small and has basic rates. Spend your golden eggs in the Shop to upgrade the Farm. Improvements are important to achieve better results in the Campaign and World Championship. A free trial version is also available, search Google Play for "EGGGZ lite" ***Trophies*** While you play you will earn different trophies. Tap "PLAY" button in the main menu and you will see them (earned and available). Tap any trophy to get the info. Each trophy increases one of farm rates. If you have all the trophies you have more chances to become a worldwide leader! ***Special Missions*** Two missions at the top of the map are available only if you have "Great Farmer" trophy. You can pass them several times. Each time they become harder, but you can get extra gold eggs to improve one of farm rates. ***Power-ups*** Spring: prevent 1 egg from breaking. Heart: Adds 1 life (if you have less than 5 lifes). Anvil: Stuns a chicken for some time. Magnet: Basket attracts eggs for some time. Hourglass: Slows down game speed for some time. ***Specials*** The racoon appears from time to time to stole a golden egg. You can buy the dog and the hedge to prevent this. The dog barks at the racoon... if isn't sleeping. The dog increases probability to stop the coon by 30%. When the rooster sings some chickens become in love and stop to lay eggs. Flowerbed makes chikens feel good and they lay golden eggs more often. Big flowerbed makes laying hens even more happy. Hedge sometimes helps to stop racoon. The better hedge you have the less eggs will be stolen. ***Online World Championship*** Egggz has OpenFeint online leaderboard - World Championship. Get as much score points as possible. 1 egg = 1 point and +5 points for every golden egg. Your result (max score) is reflected at the Worldwide Leaderboard. The Big Farm is required to enter the World Championship (it is available at the shop when the Medium Farm and the Dog are purchased). ***Press about the game*** best-apps.t3.com: "The graphics are gorgeous, with the menu screen and main gameplay footage bright and detailed." gameolosophy.com: "Egggz is a great simple game that will get you shreiking in excitement." androidappreviewsource.com: "The graphics are absolutely awesome and of high quality. The controls are simply to use and very responsive. This is truely a high quality Android game." androidandme.com: "While the game play is simple, EGGGZ is a great distraction and can become addicting." ***Custormer reviews about the game*** "Worth every penny! Bright graphics, funny sounds, great gameplay" "Can't stop all day all night. I think my boss is gonna take my phone" "Best phone game ever" "Love this game! Well worth buying its so addictive, great graphics!" "Wicked addicting!!" "Great and very polished game. A lot of levels and features and great gameplay"

description: MirrorOp Sender for Galaxy now supports all MirrorOp receivers! You can now register the sender with in-app purchase key to use it on any MirrorOp receiver. Now you can use your Samsung Galaxy phone or tablet to share any content to any MirrorOp enabled central display. Completely flexible and universally compatible with any app, the MirrorOp sender allows you to easily share pictures, movies, games or presentations onto your TV or projector. Your content is not streamed or retrieved from the cloud, instead the MirrorOp receiver duplicates whatever is on your device and gives you an exact copy on another display. You can even operate your Galaxy device from the receiver with a mouse or touch screen! Key Features - Duplicates screen (full mirroring) of Galaxy phones and tablets to another display - Shows dynamic content and moving images smoothly - Plays content directly from your device, no internet required - Easy to use with any MirrorOp receivers - Works universally with any app on your device - Up to 4 users sharing simultaneously to the same receiver device - Password security so you know you’re sharing on the right display - Auto orientation - Remote control with mouse or touch panel - Audio mirroring is enabled on devices with Android 4.4+ (Kitkat+) Requirements - Samsung Galaxy device running Android 4.0 or above - Free to use with wePresent WiPG-1000/wePresent WiPG-1500 receiver devices (for more info visit www.awindinc.com or local wePresent distributors) - Free to use with Barco ClickShare for Conference Rooms (CSC) and ClickShare for Meeting Rooms (CSM) receiver devices (firmware update may be required, for more info please contact your local ClickShare support or Barco representatives) - For other MirrorOp receivers, buy activation key with in-app purchase to use with all other MirrorOp receivers. Without license key, you can only use up to 5 minutes in one session but to press "PLAY" can start another 5-minutes-trial. Setup with 3 easy steps 1. Install receiver device 2. Connect to the receiver device 3. Launch the MirrorOp sender on your Galaxy and you’re on-screen Support Community Join our Google group to get news on latest features, support and new ways to use your device: https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/mirrorop-service EULA http://www.mirrorop.com/sphone2tv/EULA.txt

Transit Montreal provides access to transit schedules (Bus, subway, commuter trains) for most of the greater Montreal agencies. Its very simple and intuitive interface allows quick access to your favorites stops. Schedules are downloaded and available offline, for use in subway stations, for example. This application offers features like: - Add / remove transport agencies. - Real-time schedules available for the agencies providing them (eg STL). - Quickly find schedules by line or stop number . - Add your favorites stops to access schedules in 2 clicks. - Function 'Nearby' to determine your location, list the nearby stops and schedules. - Quick link to get directions, or plan a trip via Google Maps. - Access subway and suburban train network maps. - Schedules updated frequently. - Install widgets on your home screen to quickly access schedule of your favorite stops! (Pro Version only). List of agencies supported: - STM Société de transport de Montréal - STL Société de transport de Laval - RTL Réseau de transport de Longueuil - AMT Agence Métropolitaine de Transport CITCRC CIT Chambly-Richelieu-Carignan CITSO CIT Sud-ouest CITHSL CIT du Haut-Saint-Laurent CITLA CIT des Laurentides CITPI CIT La Presqu'île CRTL CRT Lanaudière CITLR CIT Le Richelain CITROUS CIT Roussillon CITSV CIT Sorel-Varennes CITVR CIT Vallée-du-Richelieu MRCLASSO MRC de L'Assomption MRC2M MRC de Deux-Montagnes MRCLM MRC les Moulins OMITSJU Ville de Sainte-Julie This application is not associated with any of the aforementioned companies. The posted schedules are available freely and these agencies do not guarantee its accuracy. IMPORTANT : You will need around 150mb of available disk space on the phone internal SD card if you wish to install schedules for all available agencies. To contact us for any problem you might find with stops, schedules, interface or other, please write to support@transitmtl.com . For schedules, thank you tell us the line, stopping and passages incorrect. Please rate the application on the Google Play Store and send us your questions and suggestions for improvement. Sudoku free pro brain puzzle game by orchid free games is great brain training and puzzle game, train yourself by playing Sudoku free pro brain puzzle game, Sudoku will make wonders with your brain skills, because there isn’t better way to train your brain skills then playing Sudoku free pro brain puzzle game by orchid free games developer. You will never need to buy Sudoku and spend money ever again, the game have 5 difficulty levels for your pleasure, the interface is very friendly and easy to use, inside the game you have 5 different Sudoku games that will adjustment you’re playing experience to maximum level, so all you have to do is download the game and enjoy playing Sudoku free brain train puzzle game, good luck for all the lucky players. Sudoku Pro Brain Game comes with a total of 5000 puzzles. Key Features: * Include Sudoku-X, Hyper Sudoku, Percent Sudoku, Color Sudoku and Squiggly Sudoku. * Include five difficulty levels: Easy Sudoku, Medium Sudoku, Challenging Sudoku, Hard Sudoku, and Fiendish Sudoku Sudoku originally called Number Place is a logic-based, combinatorial number-placement puzzle. The objective is to fill a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 sub-grids that compose the grid (also called "boxes", "blocks", "regions", or "sub-squares") contains all of the digits from 1 to 9. The puzzle setter provides a partially completed grid, which typically has a unique solution. Completed puzzles are always a type of Latin square with an additional constraint on the contents of individual regions. For example, the same single integer may not appear twice in the same 9×9 playing board row or column or in any of the nine 3×3 sub regions of the 9×9 playing board. The puzzle was popularized in 1986 by the Japanese puzzle company Nikoli, under the name Sudoku, meaning single number. It became an international hit in 2005.

This is 0.2beta version of aDosBox, you can always find the latest version and its source codes from here http://androiddosbox.appspot.com Note: it only works on 2.2+ devices. Remember, it is aBETA, don't be scared if you see FCs or other strange issues. And positive feedbacks are most welcome. Have fun! :)
release_text: When app quits, DOSBox exits gracefully. Add DOSBox configuration dialog which allows users to change some config during run time. Following config are supported so far - Increase CPU cycle - Decrease CPU cycle - CPU cycle up step specification - CPU cycle down step specification - Increase frameskip - Decrease frameskip Those changes are **NOT** written to dosbox-<version>.conf file. So when you restart aDOSBox, you lose the changes! In the future, this will be fixed.

You will collect virtual currencies called ""Bling"" and rarer ""Kibble"" as you play, which you can use to care for your virtual pets or buy in-game items. There will also be waiting times associated with some actions which you can skip using virtual currency. If you don't have enough virtual currency to buy an item, skip time, or perform an action, you can choose to earn additional currency gradually over time as you play the game, or purchase additional virtual currency with real money. In-app purchases range from £1.49 to £14.99. You can restrict in-app purchases by adjusting your User Controls in your Play Store settings. Supported languages: English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish, Turkish and Arabic. An additional download of 50 to 150 MB is required to play this game. Please note the size of this required download may change without notice. Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet. Certain aspects of this game like collaborating with, playing against or sharing in-game items with other players will require the player to connect to a social network like Facebook, Gameloft LIVE!, or Game Center. Please note this connection is never compulsory to progress through the game. This game may contain third-party advertisements that will redirect you to a third-party site. ___________________________________ Visit our official site at http://www.gameloft.com Follow us on Twitter at http://glft.co/GameloftonTwitter or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/Gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles. Check out our videos and game trailers on http://www.youtube.com/Gameloft Contact us by mail: Gameloft, 14 rue Auber, 75009 Paris, France; by e-mail: support@gameloft.com ; by phone: 0-808-234-8679

LINE reshapes communication around the globe, bringing you closer to your family, friends, and loved ones—for free. With voice and video calls, messages, and a limitless variety of exciting stickers, you’ll be able to express yourself in ways that you’ve never thought possible. With over 600 million users worldwide, LINE’s constantly expanding platform will continue to provide exciting new experiences and convenience. ▷ LINE’s New Features Chat search feature: Never lose track of a conversation again with the new chat search feature. Search chat room names and messages with Android 4.1 and above or just chat room names with Android 2.3 and above. ▷ LINE’s Main Features Free voice and video calls: Use your PC or smartphone to keep in touch with friends and family both at home and abroad, or hold a business meeting on the go! Instant messaging anywhere: Conversation is just a tap away. Spice it up with LINE’s exciting collection of stickers or send pictures, videos, and even GPS coordinates to let your friends know what you’re up to. A full-featured social networking service: Post your day-to-day activities to your Timeline or comment on your friends’ posts. Group chats: Share important information with your co-workers or talk about mutual interests with your closest friends. Find new expressions in the Sticker Shop: The world’s largest collection of stickers features famous and unique characters from around the world to let you express yourself just the way you want to. Stay informed with LINE official accounts: Connect directly with your favorite celebrities and companies by friending their official accounts. Get connected to new apps: LINE provides a gateway to entertainment and lifestyle apps that will keep you entertained and bring new convenience to your life. We recommend that you use LINE with Android OS versions 2.3 and above. For more information about LINE, check out our official website. http://line.me/en/

Localize seus familiares, seus veículos sem a necessidade de adquirir outros equipamentos especiais de rastreamento, utilizando apenas 2 aparelhos celulares com sistema Android. (Obs. O descritivo passo a passo de como funciona encontra-se no final da descrição). (ATENÇÃO: O aplicativo necessita da internet apenas para exibir o mapa) (ATENÇÃO: Caso o numero que você deseja enviar sua localização NÃO for LOCAL coloque o 0XX(Operadora) e o código de área, para que o aplicativo funcione corretamente.) (Caso for utilizar no veiculo coloque o celular no painel para não perder o sinal do GPS). Este aplicativo tem como objetivo fornecer as coordenadas de GPS em locais que não possui internet. Um sistema de localização programado. Assim quando você estiver com o modo viagem ativado o sistema enviara suas coordenadas via SMS para que os contatos selecionados saibam sua posição no mapa, os pontos onde você passou com data e hora e também as coordenadas de latitude e longitude. O usuário cadastra os números que ele quer que seja informado sua posição, o sistema ira capturar sua localização via GPS e ira enviar via SMS aos números cadastrados sua posição. O sistema automaticamente intercepta a mensagem e salva assim quando você quiser localizar alguém basta ir em localizar contatos e clicar no contato e selecionar ver localização no mapa e as posições do contato serão marcadas com bandeiras. Passo 1: clique em ver contatos selecionados para inserir o contato que receberá o SMS (nome e numero do telefone). Passo 2: clique em definir tempo de espera para envio do SMS. Passo 3: ativar modo viagem. Como visualizar as posições. Passo 1: clique em localizar contato. Passo 2: clique no contato que deseja visualizar. Passo 3: clique em ver localização no mapa (clique na bandeira e verá as coordenadas a data e a hora). Locate your family members, their vehicles without the need to purchase other special equipment tracking, using only 2 mobile devices with Android system. (Note The step by step description of how is the end of the description). (NOTE: The application requires only the Internet to view the map) (NOTE: If the number you want to send your location is NOT LOCAL put the 0XX (Operator) and the area code for the application to work correctly.)   (If you use the vehicle place the phone on the dashboard to not lose the GPS signal). This application aims to provide GPS coordinates for locations that do not have internet. A location system programmed. So when you are traveling with the mode enabled system coordinates sent via SMS to selected contacts know your position on the map, the points you spent with date and time and also the latitude and longitude. The user registers the numbers that he wants to be told their position, the system will capture your location via GPS and will send SMS to numbers registered its position. The system automatically intercepts the message and saved so when you want to find someone just go find contacts and click the contact and select to view the location map and the positions of the contact will be marked with flags. Step 1: Click to see selected contacts to enter the contact who will receive the SMS (name and phone number). Step 2: click to set timeout for sending SMS. Step 3: Activate way trip. Viewing positions. Step 1: click locate contact. Step 2: Click the contact you want to view. Step 3: click to see location on the map (click the banner and see the coordinates date and time).

description: Arrive on time with Arrivo Sydney Lite! Now supporting Android Wear. Favourite stops and their next departures show up on your Android Wear watch if you are nearby. Manage your commute from your wrist. Arrivo Sydney is your powerful commuting companion providing Realtime departure and location information for Sydney Buses and Trains (--> please refer to list below for supported agencies). Realtime departure information takes your commute to the next level, helping you make your travel time and decisions more efficient. “Should I take the Bus that is approaching or do I wait for the Express Bus that is just around the corner?” Imagine no more waiting at the Bus Stop. Take the guess work out of wondering when your Bus will arrive. Just download Arrivo Sydney and check on your Bus in Realtime! Even when you are offline without a data connection you still have access to the scheduled departure information stored locally on your device. With Arrivo Sydney Lite in your pocket you have access to Sydney's Bus & Train information anywhere and anytime. Currently supported agencies: * Sydney State Transit (STA) Buses * Newcastle Buses (STA) * Busway Blacktown Buses * CDC Hillsbus R4 * Forest Coach Lines * Transdev Shorelink * NSW Trains * Sydney Trains * Sydney Ferries * Sydney Light Rail We will add other bus operators & ferries soon. Arrivo Sydney Lite makes your commute easy with a variety of benefits: * BETA: Favourite Stop Proximity Alerts: Get a notification when you are nearby one of your favourite stops. * BETA: Boarding now feature to track your progress while on your trip. (--> Please note: Both of these features are in BETA and in active development. They do need GPS access and will NOT work underground! Please enable high accuracy location services in your Android settings for best results.) * Realtime Location information so you know where your Bus or Train is right now. * Realtime Departure information so you know when your Bus or Train will get to your Stop/Station. * Follow your Bus or Train on the map and check on its progress. * Put your Stops 'on the radar' with the Radar feature. Arrivo Sydney notifies you when you get near your Stop and shows you the next departures. * Accessibility information for train stations * Immediately find the next departure for your Stop - by Route, by Stop name. * Use predictive search from the action bar on the top of the app to quickly find your Route or Stop. * View next Departures for any Sydney STA Bus Stop and Train Station. * View your Trip details so you know where & when to get off. * View the Stops for your Trip on the map. * Get convenient access to transport info Tweets to stay on top of commuting conditions. * Arrivo Sydney Lite works anytime and anywhere. If you do not have a data network connection to get the Realtime updates you can still access the scheduled departures. * The scheduled timetable information is stored on your phone. * Arrivo Sydney informs you when updated timetable information is available for download. Check your notifications bar to download the most up-to-date timetable available. Get access to Realtime departure and location information and download Arrivo Sydney Lite today! Please note that this is the lite version with features limited for demonstration purposes. It is also ad supported. Please check out our full version (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.arrivo.syd) to experience the app with the full feature set and without ads.
release_text: * Ferry and LightRail support * Fix for 'follow vehicle' screen issue * Update for timetable download issue witnessed on some devices * Miscellaneous improvements

description: It is recommended for International galaxy devices but should work on others. Any individual can use this to get the details of what is going with power supply factors of the phone. What this app does : -App lets you know about the current being driven to charge the battery from charger. -Shows battery stats with various charging parameters. Current_Now : Value of current from charger. Current_Max : This is what important, device is charged on this value Current_Avg : Average value usually same as max. REPORTS : with stock charger- galaxy s3: current max should be 1000mA galaxy note 3: current max should be 1200mA galaxy note 2 : current max should be 1600mA Tags: galaxy charging current voltage battery slow charge adapter charger

iBlueButton - Your health in your hands, for you and your loved ones. iBlueButton is ideally suited towards those consumers covered by Medicare or their family care givers, Americans covered by TRICARE, Veterans and individuals whose healthcare providers are using the services of California Direct or San Diego HealthConnect to securely send medical records to their patients mobile devices running the iBlueButton app. The iBlueButton® app is an award winning app (Fierce 2013 Healthcare Innovation Award; U.S Department of Health and Human Services: 2012 Blue Button Mash Up Challenge winner) designed by a team of physicians and programmers committed to providing consumers secure and convenient access to their personal health information – and the personal health information of their loved ones – so that they can directly share this information with their doctors wherever they are seen. Following a path of continuous innovation and improvement, iBlueButton includes these main features – Features: • Create and maintain full personal-health Profiles for you and your loved ones. • Automatic BlueButton record download and access from leading Blue Button enabled patient portals, including My HealtheVet for Veterans; MyMedicare for Medicare beneficiaries, TRICARE Online for active-duty military, as well as Aetna and RelayHealth. • The award-winning MyMedicare dashboard with the ability to filter between 6, 12 and 36 month views. The MyMedicare dashboard displays the unwieldy, coded and text-based MyMedicare Blue Button record into a beautiful and intuitive user interface, organizing your Medicare record into pleasing tables for medications, conditions and other information. • Automatic access of your medical records from your healthcare provider electronic medical record (EMR) systems using 2014 certified EMRs with the use of a secure e-mail type of transmission called the Direct protocol. iBlueButton automatically generates Direct addresses for each Profile so that you can receive your health record directly from your doctor on your own device. This exact feature of sending records from providers to iBlueButton Direct addresses is currently in production with San Diego Health Connect and California Direct. • Automatic creation of a Summary Record. The iBlueButton app automatically creates a “Summary Record” from all records received in your app (e.g. EMR records, VA, TRICARE, or Medicare Blue Button records). • Easy lookup for health information at MedlinePlus for medical conditions, medications, immunizations listed in the Summary Record. • Easy annotation of your Summary Record or your family member record with self-entered information about allergies, over-the-counter or other medications, or additional medical conditions with easy-to-select lists. • Mark data-specific Summary Record data as private, as well as possible erroneous diagnosis or medication information seen in your records. • Share health records with your doctor. Easily and securely “Push” your records directly to your doctor’s iPad at the time of you are being seen. At the same time, receive back on your iPhone health records transferred by your doctor. • Access other apps and transferring files including images: Scan paper records using the built-in camera function, or import photos into the app from your camera roll. • Unique privacy feature: The iBlueButton app does not store any of your sensitive personal health record information on a Humetrix or third party server to be shared with other entities. All your information is securely stored, encrypted on your personal mobile device which only you can access. Humetrix is dedicated to protecting the privacy rights of users of the iBlueButton app. For our full Privacy statement, please visit the following page of our website: http://www.humetrix.com/ibb_privacy_policy.html

description: BrainPOP ESL™ is a comprehensive English language learning program that uses engaging animated movies to model conversational English. The movies and related features are leveled, building upon each other to reinforce vocabulary and usage. New concepts are presented within everyday situations, helping to provide context. BrainPOP ESL's structure enables students to master the language in a step-by-step process, giving them the confidence they need to read and speak English. The app offers 18 free lessons across all skill levels, and the following upgrades are available via in-app purchase: Level 1: Includes all 30 beginner lessons, designed for those with little or no prior English. Level 2: Includes all 30 intermediate lessons, for those with a growing understanding of English. Level 3: Includes all 30 advanced lessons, for those who have some mastery of English. Full Access: Includes all 90 BrainPOP ESL lessons, including beginner, intermediate, and advanced. BrainPOP ESL site subscribers can log in directly from the app at no additional cost. Terms of Use: http://www.brainpop.com/about/terms_of_use/ Privacy Policy: http://www.brainpop.com/about/privacy_policy/ User Agreement: http://www.brainpop.com/about/user_agreement/ Copyrights Notice: http://www.brainpop.com/about/trademarks/

*** New game modes included!! *** Tap Blox is a match-3 game with simple but stylish graphics and a addictive gameplay. Special Items like "Column Cleaner", "Row Cleaner" and "Cross Cleaner" helps you to get best scores. If you are fast enough you can get an endless gameplay with endless fun. Fast, faster - Tap Blox. How To Play: CLASSIC Match 3 or more identical blocks, be fast to get more time to play, because the time goes by. The game is over if the time is up. ENHANCED Play the same style as in classic mode but with a new Special Item "ColorCleaner" for removing all blocks with the same color. PUZZLE You need at least two identical blocks to remove it from the playfield. Find 3 or more identical blocks to to fill the playfield with new blocks. The more you can remove at once, the more new you get. The game is over, if there are no more matches.

description: Monitor your battery level with this hexagon grid live wallpaper. The number of filled hexagons reflects your battery charge, and their color shifts from green to yellow to red. Also the grid will animate when receiving SMS. Live wallpaper features: ★ 4 hexagon styles ★ 3 drawing patterns ★ Various color themes, and option to create a custom color theme ★ Must-have live wallpaper for Neon Genesis Evangelion or NERV themed styles. Is this wallpaper eating too much RAM? Do you experience random crashes? Please try using larger hexagons in the settings. Fewer hexagons on screen = fewer memory used. ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ This app is a live wallpaper. Once you download it, it will not appear in your app drawer. To set it as a wallpaper, long press on your desktop, until the menu appears. Then choose Wallpapers -> Live wallpapers -> Hexagon Battery Live Wallpaper -> Set wallpaper. For any problem or question send an email to the developer. ♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦♦ Keywords: hexagon hexagons grid neon genesis evangelion eva nerv battery level charge indicator

No necesita conexión a Internet para su funcionamiento También te recomiendo "Concordancia Bíblica" - se encuentran en mis aplicaciones. Uno de los Comentarios Bíblicos más completos que se haya escrito en toda la historia de la literatura cristiana, es el de Matthew Henry, el célebre puritano inglés del siglo XVI, se enfocó en la exposición de la Palabra de Dios. Su Comentario de toda la Biblia sigue siendo uno de los más usados por predicadores y estudiantes de las Escrituras, aunque hayan transcurrido casi tres siglos desde que se publicó la primera edición. ¿La razón fundamental? Su profundidad y enfoque. El mejor comentario bíblico devocional escrito hasta la fecha, sobre el que Spurgeon afirmó: «Todo ministro de Dios debería leer el MATTHEW HENRY con plena atención por lo menos una vez.» Matthew Henry (1662-1714) nacio en Broad Oak, en el condado gales de Flintshire. Su padre era clerigo. Fue ordenado en la Iglesia Presbiteriana Britanica donde sirvio en el pastorado de Chester 1687 a 1712. En 1704 Henry comenzo a escribir su comentario en forma de Notas del Nuevo Testamento, completandose esta obra monumental poco despues de su muerte, ocurrida en 1714. Su teologia es un fiel testimonio de la verdad evangelica, enfatizando la depravacion total del hombre y la gracia soberana y salvadora de Dios. Su obra ademas, no solo demuestra una profunda capacidad de profundidad espiritual, sino la erudicion que proporciona un gran conocimiento del griego y del hebreo. Henry es recordado como pastor afectuoso, amante apasionado de la Palabra de Dios y hombre de gran integridad personal que ha dejado su huella en los corazones de innumerables cristianos que anhelan comprender mas profundamente las riquezas de las Escrituras. No internet connection needed for operation I also recommend "Bible concordance" - are in my applications. One of the Bible Reviews more complete than ever written in the history of Christian literature, is that of Matthew Henry, the English Puritan famous sixteenth century, focused on the exposition of the Word of God. Your Review of the whole Bible remains one of the most used by preachers and students of the Scriptures, although almost three centuries have elapsed since the first edition was published. Is the rationale? Its depth and focus. Best Bible commentary devotional written to date, on which Spurgeon said: "Every minister of God should read MATTHEW HENRY mindfully at least once." Matthew Henry (1662-1714) was born in Broad Oak, in the county of Flintshire Wales. His father was a clergyman. He was ordained in the British Presbyterian Church where he served as pastor of Chester 1687 to 1712. In 1704 Henry began to write your comment in the form of letters of the New Testament, completing this monumental work shortly after his death in 1714. His theology is a faithful witness to the evangelical truth, emphasizing total depravity of man and the sovereign and saving grace of God. His work also, not only demonstrates a profound capacity for spiritual depth, but the erudition that provides a great knowledge of Greek and Hebrew. Henry is remembered as caring pastor, passionate lover of the Word of God and man of great personal integrity that has made its mark in the hearts of countless Christians who long to understand more deeply the riches of Scripture.
