The basic tones your Android device is missing. Classic rings; elegant notification tones; professional sounding beeps, alerts, and alarms. None of the pop songs or rude sound effects. Designed and mastered for your smartphone by RCP. 100% AD FREE! Business Ringtones lets you preview, manage, and save 85 of the most office-appropriate tones from our library. You can assign your ringtones and notifications from the app or simply save all of the tones to your phone's memory or SD Card to use with the system settings. In short: · Professional business ringtones · Unique tones for text alerts · Interesting beeps, sequences, and chiming effects · No ads, popups, or malware · Full featured app with customer support GUARANTEE Professional ringtone design and dedicated customer service. Good tones and smart apps. No ads or other annoyances! We never charge hidden or recurring fees or share your information. We do not spam or scam. If you ever have any problems, we want to help you! About Permissions: The use of permissions in this app is strictly related to setting and saving ringtones. We guarantee the privacy of your personal information. SUPPORT We pride ourselves on offering quick and helpful support to all of our customers. If you have any trouble installing the ringtones, please contact our support team and we will help you get the tones installed as quickly and easily as possible. Audio previews, support, and more are available at rcptones.com. ©2015 RCP Ringtones
release_text: / changelog section. Fill it up please Full Review RCP Tones 1 April 2014 We did include information in the changelog for 3.5.0, but not for all languages. We are adding translations to the changelog for the latest version now. Version 3.5.0 fixes a looping-notification issue that occurred on certain phones. Also added previews to our latest apps. Thank you for letting us know, but does it really warrant a 1-star rating? Alex Butler 1 April 2014 Good I can now feel like Jack Bauer whenever I'm called Full Review Etim Akpan 31 December 2013 Best tools for business Get it. Etim Full Review James Borders 2 April 2014 Great App I just wanted a nice basic ringer not all that goofy new age sounding stuff. This app is perfect. Full Review Jason Sloan 27 December 2013 awesome great app Full Review Naaman Harris 20 November 2013 M A Full Review Alvin Aponte 11 November 2013 OK $ Full Review Mike Mart 11 November 2013 Koo Full Review Alex Hernandez 12 August 2013 Straightforward and simple. Excellent. Just what I was looking for... simple, low key, business appropriate sounds. Look no further. This is all you need. Beware of app by the same name made by Aura. This one is much better and no ads. Full Review David J. Levy 6 July 2013 exactly what I was looking for! the System CTU and System Down ringtones were exactly what I was looking for! Everything plays clear and loud, well worth the couple of dollars. That video helped me immensely. Full Review B. Rob 31 Bryan 28 June 2013 Galaxy S4 Good tones but now my text tone won't work it vibrates when phone is on loud. I wanna use phones tone. But it's not working. ? Help. ? Full Review RCP Tones 8 July 2013 Hi, please try to reboot your phone and re-set the tones from our app. If these solutions do not help, please contact our support team and we will help you out. John Maloney 3 May 2013 Great sounds! These are sensible sounds that will suit people who do not want to appear like dipsticks to all around them. Installation had a small glitch that was sorted out very quickly by excellent support. Worth the money. Full Review Lee Woods 19 April 2013 Cool options One minor problem... When you exit the app the sample tone continues to play in a loop Full Review RCP Tones 15 May 2013 Thanks for letting us know about this issue. We've fixed this in the most recent update (2.5.1). A Google User 5 May 2013 Repeating sounds The sounds are very good but would be better if they didn't repeat Full Review RCP Tones 15 May 2013 Glad to hear you like the tones! Just so you know, when set or saved as a ringtone the sound will repeat, when set or saved as a notification tone, the sound will not repeat. Please get in touch if you would rather have a set of all non-repeating tones. Jason Matthew P 29 March 2013 ♠ missing Tones If you reset your phone you'll probably be missing tones, at least for the customers that have had the app a while. Just buy the full pack and call it a day! Full Review Trent Jaeger 7 March 2013 Not crap Several useable tones. Full Review Aaron Thomas 15 February 2013 Very nice Got tired of all the crazy ring tones. I don't need pop songs, I need a ringer that I can hear. This has all of them. Nothing fancy, just good quality, real ring tones. Full Review Tsering Dothar 8 March 2013 Not happy Very limited Full Review Sarah Hughes 13 December 2012 Professional! I work at a salon business and this allows me to set ringtones that wont disrupt my clients services. Full Review A Google User 7 September 2012 Make Ur Phone Sound Like a Phone This is the set of ringtones I have been searching for for months. I was really pushed to the edge with my new Galaxy S3 that came only with melodious ringtones that sound nothing like a phone. I want my phone to sound like a phone. This is a great set of business-like ringtones. Thanks RCP for some adult ringtones. Full Review What's New Important Notice: The next version of our app (coming mid to late April) will contain NEW and REMASTERED ringtones. We're telling you now so you can save your current favorites to your phone before the next update. We are going to be adding tones but also taking some away. We are doing this to maintain the high quality of our tone collections and are trying our best to improve our product, so please understand! If you ever need a certain tone you can ALWAYS contact us!

description: 언제 어디서나 무료로 실시간 케이블 방송을 즐기는 새로운 TV! 에브리온TV는 PC에서도, 스마트폰에서도 무료로 실시간 케이블 방송을 즐길 수 있는 새로운 TV서비스 입니다. description: Feature by AT&T for MARCH MADNESS! Selected by VZW as a TOP 20 MUST HAVE APP! Inside stories & videos on the NCAA teams that matter most to you, then share with your friends. It's simple to build your personal curated news channels for your NCAA teams. Select your favorite NCAA teams & view the best sites for your team’s News, Videos, Pix, Radio, Analysis, Game Highlights, Rivals, Blogs, Recruiting & Social Media including Twitter, Facebook & YouTube. Gameday Central also covers the best sites for your team’s game day weather, traffic, tickets, parking, game day guides, fan clubs & alumni events. Please contact my2ThumbZ@Gmail.com with questions or team requests. GAMEDAY CENTRAL is essential for any NCAA college football & basketball fan & very distinct than ESPN apps. Select from 80+ NCAA teams for the very best team coverage. The above services are free! 7" & 10" tablets are supported. Fully featured version of the popular No Signal Alert app. Featured in Lifehacker.com's "One Dozen Super-Useful Android Apps" as "Especially useful for when you’re expecting that important call that just isn’t coming (because it can’t!)..." Ever missed an important call because your phone had no signal and you never noticed? No Signal Alert detects when your phone is in a "dead zone" or with no reception and sends a customized notification of your choice (sound, vibrate, led color indicator, etc). No Signal Alert can keeps track of every time you loose and recover your phone signal, providing users with useful statistics such as time, location and address when signal was lost. Features: ★ Customize your alerts completely (sound, vibrate, led,etc.) ★ Record and maintain logs of your phone signal events ★ View map of your known dead-zones ★ 1x1 Home-screen monitoring widget ★ Signal meter gauge ★ View signal statistics for your carrier ★ Export logs to an Excel-supported CSV files ★ Backup and Restore your logs to your SD card ★ Supports GSM/CDMA Note: Please make sure to read the "Helpful tips" when you first install the application. We appreciate your feedback and encourage you to help us improve our products. Visit our website http://www.smartandroidapps.com and don't forget to check out our other apps in the market. Smart Android Apps, LLC

Engage in a battle against the dealer in this 3D simulation of the classic blackjack casino card game. Play by the rules of some of the most famous world casinos or create your own. All casinos come with their basic strategy table and if you create your own casino the table is automatically calculated. Rules are highly customizable with addition of some rarely used ones. Learn how to play or sharpen your skills with the built-in basic strategy tutor. Bring your skill to the next level using one of the 15 card counting systems. Special attention was paid to the user interface giving the cards a decent size, no unnecessary buttons to occupy the screen, usage of sensors to make the playing experience even more comfortable. To add more spice there are 52 achievements waiting to be unlocked (plus earn real-life rewards!) and a leaderboard to compare your skills with players around the World. For players who do not thrust the PRNG (pseudo-random number generator) which is built into their phone/tablet (and used for shuffling) here it is, a unique new feature: TRUE RNG ! (the numbers are generated via atmospheric noise) No more crying the dealer cheats ;) All this and even more, packed in 3D graphics with nice animations, sound and speech and there is a reason why this game is called "Ultimate BlackJack 3D" ! Play this game to sharpen your skills before your next trip to Las Vegas... ★★★ Check out our new blackjack game: Ultimate BlackJack Reloaded ★★★ Main features of "Ultimate BlackJack 3D" ★ highly optimized 3D graphics and animations for lifelike gameplay ★ clean and friendly user interface ★ text-to-speech (prerecorded and live) ★ usage of Accelerometer Sensor, Orientation Sensor and Vibrator ★ highly customizable (game rules, user interface, graphics, camera view, sound, speech...) ★ create your own casino with all most popular Black Jack rules customizable (hole card, surrender, split, dealer peek,    penetration, burn cards, cut card, charlie, number of decks, continuous shuffling machine, doubledown rules...) ★ play the Double Attack variant of the game ★ play the player's blackjack sidebet variant ★ play the Lucky Ladies sidebet variant ★ play the Super Seven sidebet variant ★ play by the rules of 7 world famous casinos ★ basic strategy table calculator ★ compare basic strategy tables side by side ★ basic strategy tutor while playing (before or after making a move) ★ 15 counting systems, display of true and/or running count ★ 10 user profiles ★ 9 card backgrounds (new: Christmas theme) ★ leaderboard and 52 achievements (with real-life rewards!) ★ data backup/restore ★ game statistics ★ optional input by gestures ★ true random number generator (via atmospheric noise) ★ mini-game Card Spotting ★ continually enhanced with new features ★ no internet connection required (works offline) ★ COMPLETELY FREE ★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★ Let this game be your pro blackjack trainer (mentor), have fun while playing and do not lose faith on dealer's blackjack ! :) Check out why many users claim this is the best blackjack app on the market. Did you know? ★ Blackjack (black jack, 21, twenty-one) is the only casino game where you can actually beat the house if played by basic strategy and using card counting ★ Blackjack is the most widely played casino game in the world ★ Other casino games inspired by blackjack include Spanish 21 and pontoon GAME COMMANDS Hit - touch card pile or use menu Stand - touch any of your cards Split - shake phone or use menu Doubledown - touch any of the dealer's cards Surrender - touch the "white flag" icon or raise bottom of your phone If using gestures to play Hit - touch the screen Stand - swipe from left to right Split - long press anywhere Doubledown - double tap Surrender - swipe left-right-left

A complete guide to Vietnam that works offline. Features: - Vietnam at a Glance: the background info that you need to have before you go. - A country map highlighting all the cities and national parks. - Complete city guides for the most important destinations, with sights, restaurants, things to do and a city map. - Mini guides for less important destinations. - A concise phrasebook for Vietnamese. About Triposo: We make great, interactive travel guides. To make our guides we use the content that is freely available. Open content sites like Wikitravel, Wikipedia, World66 and Openstreetmap are among the best resources for any traveler. Our mission is to make that content relevant for you. So we mix and mash and annotate - and we distill great, relevant travel guides out of it. We like open content. In fact some of us were involved in World66, one of the first open content travel guides on the web. Triposo's travel guides are very much a re-mix of open content out there. Currently we're using content from: Wikipedia, Wikitravel, World66, Open Streetmaps, DMOZ and Chefmoz We're big fans of these projects. If you stumble across some inaccurate information in this guide, we would appreciate

description: Candy Flow is a simple but highly addictive puzzle game.Are you ready for a Flow experience? Connect all matching Candies with lines to fill the board. Each path must begin and end at a candy, and must not intersect another path.Watch out as the lines will break if you cross them! A simple Candy connecting puzzle game which can take weeks to master!Who will be the master of this flow game,Candy Flow? If you like Flow Game for Free, you'll love Candy Flow!

Designed to be used with one hand while you're shopping, Quick Discount is the best discount calculator app available. When you're out shopping you don't have time to type or press a ton of small buttons. This app instantly calculates your discounted price without any typing or tedious button pressing. Just use the sliders to adjust the price, discount, and even a second discount. The discounted price updates instantly and you can get back to your shopping. It even displays the amount you saved right below your discounted price. Quick and easy shopping! This is the easiest to use shopping app available, and it's completely free! No longer will you have to guess what your discounted price is while you're shopping. Without pressing any buttons, just use the sliders to quickly adjust price, discount, and even a 2nd discount. You can have your quick discounted price immediately and then continue with your shopping. Whether you're doing a huge holiday shopping run or trying to figure out how much you can buy on that gift card you received for Christmas...this app is a shopping lifesaver. Quick discount is perfect for your holiday shopping or for a quick shopping run after work. Download it today!! NEW!!! Now you can also include your local sales tax so that you know exactly what you're spending when you're shopping. This option is easily reached in the Preferences menu. Key Features: ★ Easy to use interface ★ No typing or button pressing necessary ★ Discounted price updates immediately ★ Displays "Discounted Price" and "Amount Saved" ★ Designed to be used with one hand while you're shopping. ★ NEW! Quick Discount now includes a sales tax option. Here's what a few users are saying: " ***AWESOME*** Now, when my wife & I are out shopping and she ask me, "what is 15% of $67.00?" All I have to do is flip to this app & slide my finger across the screen and I have the answer to her question. All done with one hand without even having to hit calculate!!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!! " "This is a great tool my wife loves it will be great for Black ... This is a great tool my wife loves it will be great for Black Friday shopping !!! " "Quick & Functional No useless frills and complications; calculates discounts fast and accurate. What more can you ask for? :)" Are there any features you'd like to see added? Are you having a problem with this app? Contact me at ricky@rickypatrck.com or connect with me at http://twitter.com/rdpatrick .

Avec Le Guide des Restaurants de L'Internaute, découvrez des saveurs inattendues à deux pas de chez vous. L’Internaute vous propose le guide le plus complet de France (plus de 65 000 adresses) pour découvrir des restaurants à proximité de chez vous ou à l’autre bout du pays. Des dizaines de milliers d’avis et des présentations détaillées vous aideront à faire votre choix en quelques secondes. Le Guide des Restaurants vous propose : - La liste des restaurants les plus proches du lieu où vous vous trouvez. - Une recherche par catégorie, par nom ou par ville, pour voir d’un geste où se trouvent les meilleurs restaurants japonais, brasseries, pizzerias… à proximité ou à l’autre bout de la France. - L’affichage de ces restaurants sur une carte. - Des réglages vous permettant d’afficher par exemple : les meilleurs restaurants à 10km à la ronde, les restaurants chinois à moins d’1km, les brasseries à moins de 200m… - La possibilité de donner votre avis sitôt votre repas terminé : cuisine, décoration, ambiance, service, prix… Faites connaître votre opinion, et profitez de celle des autres. - Des promos et la possibilité de réserver votre table dans certains restaurants directement depuis l'application. Nouveau : - Déposez maintenant les photos de vos restaurants préférés et des plats que vous y mangez, en direct ou depuis vos albums. - Mémorisez vos restaurants favoris pour rapidement les retrouver. - Publiez vos avis sur Facebook pour en faire profiter vos amis. Cette application nécessite une connexion 3G ou internet. Vous souhaitez nous faire une suggestion, nous signaler un problème ? Contactez-nous par e-mail : android@linternaute.com With Restaurants Guide The Internet, discover unexpected close to home flavors. The Internet offers the most comprehensive guide to France (65 000 addresses) to find restaurants near you or across the country. Tens of thousands of views and detailed presentations will help you make your choice in seconds. The Restaurant guide offers: - The list of the nearest place where you find restaurants. - A search by category, name or city to see a move where the best Japanese restaurants, pubs, pizzerias ... near or at the other end of France. - The display of these restaurants on a map. - The settings allow you to display, for example: the best restaurants in the 10km round, Chinese restaurants within 1km, breweries within 200m ... - The ability to review your meal finished soon: kitchen, decoration, atmosphere, service, price ... Make your opinion and enjoy the other. - The specials and the opportunity to book a table at restaurants directly from the app. New: - Post now photos of your favorite restaurants and dishes you eat, live or from your albums. - Save your favorites to quickly find restaurants. - Post your opinion on Facebook to share with your friends. This application requires a 3G connection or internet. Would you like to make a suggestion, we report a problem? Contact us by e-mail: android@linternaute.com

description: Waygo Translator for Chinese, Japanese and Korean has arrived on Android!! Traveling to Asia? Learning Chinese, Japanese or Korean? Instantly translate printed Chinese, Japanese or Korean text to English using your smartphone camera. No data connection needed . Go like a local. - Use your video camera as visual translator or dictionary (camera flash required) - No data connection required - See the pronunciation of the words - Simply point and translate foreign text to English - Share your translations through SMS, Facebook, Twitter and Email Waygo is the leader in visual translation services, easily translating images of printed text offline. Waygo visual translator has been featured repeatedly in ABC News, TechCrunch, The Next Web, Tech In Asia, GigaOm, Forbes, Technode, e27 and VentureBeat as the top visual Chinese translator. This free download is a limited version with 10 daily translations. Upgrade to lifetime unlimited Chinese, Japanese and Korean to English translations inside the Upgrade menu. Waygo Translator & Dictionary is compatible with Android devices running Android 4.0 and up, as long as they have a rear-facing camera with a flash. TIPS 1. Best used on clear Chinese, Japanese and Korean text (currently does not recognize stylized fonts or handwriting) 2. Intended for use on printed text, not computer screens 3. Go to www.WaygoApp.com/menu to try Waygo translator now on a sample Chinese menu. This fun app introduces kids and adults to 100 of the world's greatest paintings from da Vinci to Van Gogh, Monet and Rembrandt! Listen to 5 classical pieces by Bach, Beethoven, Brahms, and Berliotz while you solve the puzzles! The puzzles are created by slicing the painting into strips and scrambling them. To solve the puzzle simply slide the slices into the right position. You can take a peek at the full painting and the app keeps track of how many moves you make and the time it takes to solve the puzzle. Trying to solve the puzzles allows you to focus on the paintings with a degree of concentration and detail that a casual glance at a book or even a museum visit cannot achieve. This helps shape not only your general knowledge of art, but also hone your aesthetic sensibilities. This is specially valuable for kids who can recognize styes long before then can learn the names of the artists and paintings. They will learn to see the world through the eyes of these great masters while they discover the diversity of styles and techniques used in painting. This app includes 100 paintings by famous artists including Van Gogh, Rembrandt, Goya, Gauguin, Cèzanne, Seurat, Monet, Pissarro, da Vinci, Rousseau, and Velazquez among many other great masters. 3 difficulty levels means fun for children, from older toddlers to teenagers, and adults too! Tipitap Learning fun. Fun learning.

description: This is the free trial version of EGGGZ, amazing eggs-catching game. Tap chickens to help the guy to catch eggs. You have several lives. Each broken egg takes one life. You lose if you spend the last life. The Full Version is available on Google Play and it has: * 50 missions * special missions * all farm improvements * unlimited Championship mode with online Leaderboard ***Campaign Mode*** Pass missions of the Campaign and earn golden eggs. Tap a mission, read the description and play! Missions differ by aim and initial conditions. In the beginning of the Campaign you have a simple farm. It's small and has basic rates. Spend your golden eggs in the Shop to upgrade the Farm. Improvements are important to achieve better results in the Campaign and World Championship. A free trial version is also available, search Google Play for "EGGGZ lite" ***Trophies*** While you play you will earn different trophies. Tap "PLAY" button in the main menu and you will see them (earned and available). Tap any trophy to get the info. Each trophy increases one of farm rates. If you have all the trophies you have more chances to become a worldwide leader! ***Special Missions*** Two missions at the top of the map are available only if you have "Great Farmer" trophy. You can pass them several times. Each time they become harder, but you can get extra gold eggs to improve one of farm rates. ***Power-ups*** Spring: prevent 1 egg from breaking. Heart: Adds 1 life (if you have less than 5 lifes). Anvil: Stuns a chicken for some time. Magnet: Basket attracts eggs for some time. Hourglass: Slows down game speed for some time. ***Specials*** The racoon appears from time to time to stole a golden egg. You can buy the dog and the hedge to prevent this. The dog barks at the racoon... if isn't sleeping. The dog increases probability to stop the coon by 30%. When the rooster sings some chickens become in love and stop to lay eggs. Flowerbed makes chikens feel good and they lay golden eggs more often. Big flowerbed makes laying hens even more happy. Hedge sometimes helps to stop racoon. The better hedge you have the less eggs will be stolen. ***Online World Championship*** Egggz has OpenFeint online leaderboard - World Championship. Get as much score points as possible. 1 egg = 1 point and +5 points for every golden egg. Your result (max score) is reflected at the Worldwide Leaderboard. The Big Farm is required to enter the World Championship (it is available at the shop when the Medium Farm and the Dog are purchased). ***Press about the game*** best-apps.t3.com: "The graphics are gorgeous, with the menu screen and main gameplay footage bright and detailed." gameolosophy.com: "Egggz is a great simple game that will get you shreiking in excitement." androidappreviewsource.com: "The graphics are absolutely awesome and of high quality. The controls are simply to use and very responsive. This is truely a high quality Android game." androidandme.com: "While the game play is simple, EGGGZ is a great distraction and can become addicting." ***Custormer reviews about the game*** "Worth every penny! Bright graphics, funny sounds, great gameplay" "Can't stop all day all night. I think my boss is gonna take my phone" "Best phone game ever" "Love this game! Well worth buying its so addictive, great graphics!" "Wicked addicting!!" "Great and very polished game. A lot of levels and features and great gameplay"

Medrills-Administer Oxygen The Basic/EMT task of Oxygen Administration is fully illustrated using 3D graphics and interactive exercises to reinforce key learning concepts. This lesson includes: selecting the proper size and type of oxygen, testing and preparation of the equipment, choosing and attaching an oxygen delivery device, placing the appropriate oxygen delivery device on the patient, administering oxygen, as well as safety precautions when using an oxygen tank. Medrills, presented by ArchieMD, provides compelling training material for preventive and general medical tasks such as obtaining IV access, performing CPR, or using an AED. The app is dedicated to an individual medical task and includes: 1. An instructional animation providing a deep understanding of the medical task. 2. Training with interactive exercises which enable practicing the task to prepare for assessment. 3. Testing section to evaluate the user’s knowledge and skill level of a particular task. 4. Receive CECBEMS course credit hours for mastering the test. You can now purchase the Testing Mode for $.99, which gives you to the capabilities of receiving Continuing Education Hours (CEH)/ Continuing Medical Education (CME) credits after successfully completing the application. These hours are approved by CECBEMS, the national accrediting body for EMS continuing education courses and course providers. In the Testing and Certification mode, EMTs (non Paramedic) will receive 1.0 Basic Continuing Education Hour, certified by CECBEMS. NOTE – IN ORDER TO RECEIVE CEH CREDIT HOURS AN ADDITIONAL CHARGE OF : $0.99 MUST BE MADE AS AN IN-APP PURCHASE. USERS WHO DO NOT PURCHASE THE CEH AND TESTING MODE MAY VIEW THE INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO AND TRAINING MODE BUT WILL NOT BE PARTICIPATING IN A CECBEMS ACCREDITED COURSE. CECBEMS verifies that sound education principles have been demonstrated in the development of this educational offering as evidenced by the review of its objectives, teaching plan, faculty, and program evaluation processes. CECBEMS does not endorse or support the actual opinions or material content as presented by the speaker(s) and/or sponsoring organization.

description: Fast. Intuitive. Simple. Themed! Dialapp brings everything about dialling into one place- Place search, magic list, call log, missed calls, dialpad, contact list and tiny contacts. * In-app Place Search to search and call any business place around you- from pizza places to plumbers to hotels to hospitals * Magic list is a contextual list that shows you people you are most likely to call, and evolves based on your patterns * Call log redesigned, has a separate missed call list, so you never miss a missed call * Themes * Tiny contacts lets you save contacts for a short, predefined period, and reduces the clutter in your address book ★ "The app magically knows who you're likely to call" - Android Police. ★ "Dialapp’s Predictive Dialer For Android Knows Who You’re Going To Call Next" - Techcrunch Feature list: * Place search * Magic list * T9 search * Tiny contacts * Voice search * Themes Quick tips: - Long press to access contact menu: history, edit number, share, text - Pull left to text and right to call (home screen) - Swipe right Coming soon: * More Themes * Dialpad calculator * Auto call log backup (pro) * Tiny contacts backup (pro) * Call reminders (pro) * Call prompt (Prompt me to talk about that bill when I call husband) (pro) For feature requests and suggestions, please drop us a mail at dialer@dexetra.com *Sign in with your Google account for magic list* PERMISSIONS =========== ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION- To access the location of the calls you made/recevied. android.permission.INTERNET, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - Cloud Syncing, and creating the contextual call log READ_CONTACTS - For quick actions, people display on call log etc. WAKE_LOCK - Use display and processor time efficiently, yet keeping your call log fresh. MANAGE_ACCOUNTS, AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS, WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS, READ_SYNC_SETTINGS - Create and maintain a 'dialapp' sync account and service. WRITE_CONTACTS - To add to the intelligent call log. CALL_PHONE - To make a call via dialapp ACCESS_WIFI_STATE,CHANGE_WIFI_STATE - For intelligently syncing with cloud.

You can also use it as a Random Encounter in your games, if you need some inspiration. Features: Online database has over 1500 encounters, quests, locations, campaign seeds and ideas. Update from online database which is constantly growing. The entries are divided into several sections and more to come. Currently they include short and long encounter and quest ideas, waterborn encounter ideas, science fiction and modern game ideas. It also include some fantasy rural and urban locations. Follow the app on facebook page https://www.facebook.com/pages/RPG-Encounter/546899688705700

LBAR Homes brings the most accurate and up-to-date real estate information right to your phone! With LBAR Homes, you have access to all homes for sale and MLS listings throughout the Bluegrass covering Anderson, Bourbon, Clark, Fayette, Franklin, Jessamine, Montgomery, Nicholas, Powell, Scott and Woodford Counties. LBAR Homes is provided by the Lexington-Bluegrass Association of REALTORS® (LBAR), the region’s leading advocate for homeownership. LBAR understands the value and joy of owning a home and represents more than 2,000 REALTORS®. Use LBAR Homes anytime, anywhere to pull up homes for sale around you using the GPS search, or find homes based on address, city or zip code. LBAR Homes will show you all the details you want to know about a property, including price, square footage, estimated mortgage, taxes, features, descriptions, pictures, maps and more! Save your favorite homes to view later. You can also text or email homes to your family and friends. If you have questions or want a tour of the home for sale, press the “Find an Agent” feature to find a LBAR REALTORS® member who can assist you in your area.

description: La Santa Biblia, edición Reina Valera (también llamada "Sagradas Escrituras 1569" en lenguaje actual, con traducción propia). - Totalmente en español, contiene el Antiguo y el Nuevo Testamento al completo. - Planes de lectura: múltiples planes de lectura para leer la Biblia en 30, 45, 60, 90, 180 o 365 días (algunos sólo en la versión PRO). - Continue la lectura desde el último versículo que haya leído con un sólo click! - (NUEVO) Widget en el escritorio con versículos aleatorios cada hora. - Sección de ajustes, para configurar fácilmente la aplicación. - Arrastre de izquierda a derecha para ir al capítulo/plan anterior y de derecha a izquierda para ir al capítulo/plan siguiente. - Renovado diseño con ActionBar. Diseño especial para tablets. - Copie versículos al portapapeles. - Pack de iconos renovado. - ¡No necesita conexión a Internet para cargar la Biblia! (a excepción de que se quiera compartir algún versículo en las redes sociales). - Selecciona tus versículos favoritos y accede a ellos fácilmente. - Versículo aleatorio en la pantalla principal - Búsqueda de términos contextual: búsqueda en toda la Biblia, restringida a un Testamento, restringida a un Libro o restringida a un Capítulo concreto. El término buscado aparecerá en negrita dentro de los versículos seleccionados. - Comparte los versículos que consideres importantes mediante las aplicaciones de mensajería y redes sociales. - Cambia el tamaño de letra a tu gusto, para hacer la lectura más sencilla y cómoda. Para obtener más funcionalidades adquiera la versión "Biblia Reina Valera PRO" - Lea la Biblia en formato apaisado/horizontal o retrato/vertical. - Todos los planes de lectura activados. - Tres modos de contraste para facilitar la lectura: diurno, nocturno y sepia. - Sin publicidad. - Velocidad mejorada. The Holy Bible, King James edition (also called "Holy Scriptures 1569" in today's language, with its own translation). - Totally in Spanish, containing the Old and New Testaments in full. - Reading Plans: multiple plans for reading the Bible in 30, 45, 60, 90, 180 or 365 days (some only in PRO version). - Continue reading from the last verse is read with a single click! - (NEW) Widget on your desktop random verses every hour. - Setting section to easily configure the application. - Drag from left to right to go to previous chapter / plan and from right to left to go to the next chapter / plan. - Renewed design with ActionBar. Special design for tablets. - Copy verses to clipboard. - Pack of renewed icons. - No internet connection needed to load the Bible! (Except for you want to share a verse in social networks). - Select your favorite verses and access them easily. - Random Verse on the main screen - Contextual search terms: search the entire Bible, restricted to a Will, restricted to a book or restricted to a particular chapter. The search term appears in bold within selected verses. - Share verses that you consider important by messaging applications and social networks. - Change the font size to your liking, to make reading easier and more convenient. For more functionalities acquire the "Biblia Reina Valera PRO" version - Read the Bible in portrait / landscape or portrait / vertical format. - All plans activated reading. - Three modes of contrast for readability: day, night and sepia. - No advertising. - Improved speed.
release_text: - Widget en el escritorio con versículos aleatorios cada hora. - Sección de ajustes mejoradas, con nuevas opciones. - Mejoras en la interfaz de usuario. - Agregado un nuevo plan de lectura. - Corregido un verso en Efesios.

Compose a professionally formatted CV in as little as 7 minutes with CV Writer. FEATURES - Auto saves as you go, so you don’t lose your work - Does NOT require an ongoing Internet connection, until you want to download or email - No need to sign-up to any service or website to use the app and get your CV, start building straight away - Instant preview as you build your CV on every screen - Download your CV to your computer in editable Microsoft Word (.doc) format - Email your CV for job vacancies straight from the App - Includes Grab-a-Phrase: 800 model phrases written by Recruiters, to guide you in what to write - Select from these 800 model phrases and tap to add saving you precious thinking time and typing! - Fully edit the model phrases provided by Grab-A-Phrase BONUS FOR GRADUATE CVs - 2 templates, so you can present Education first (a must for graduate CVs) or Employment History first for the Professional’s CV - Automatic layout by date - orders your document to show your most recent education and experience first - You can even choose to add GCSE or A Level grades and details for individual degree modules BONUS FOR ACADEMIC CVs OR VOLUNTARY CVs - Personalise your CV with optional sections including Achievements, Publications, Training, Awards, Interests, Technical Skills and Voluntary Experience etc

WikEM, The Global Emergency Medicine Wiki, is a point-of-care reference available on the web or via our dedicated mobile applications. Its emergency medicine knowledge base has thousands of quick problem-specific notes to help you care for patients, which is one of the reasons it has been downloaded by more than 100,000 users and is one of the top 10 most popular emergency medicine websites. Supported by the nonprofit OpenEM Foundation, WikEM provides a way for medical practitioners to organize online content and cross-reference clinical information at http://www.wikem.org . If you are a medical practitioner, join our contributor community and help edit our content. WikEM is intended for clinicians only and not directly for patients. WikEM serves a wide range of medical practitioners predominantly among the specialties of emergency medicine, pediatric emergency medicine, critical care, emergency medical services (EMS), and urgent care medicine, as well as primary healthcare fields such as family medicine, internal medicine, and pediatrics. Numerous sources have named WikEM as a key reference for emergency practitioners, ranging from EMTs, paramedics, and other first responders to nurses, nurse practitioners, physician assistants, and emergency physicians.

iTooch Maths 5ème est une application de soutien scolaire ludique, conçue par des enseignants, qui couvre le programme scolaire officiel de mathématiques en 5ème. Utilisées par plus de 3.000.000 de personnes dans 146 pays, les applications iTooch sont nées de la rencontre d'enseignants passionnés, de pédagogues et de professionnels du jeu vidéo, eux-mêmes parents. L'union de ces savoir-faire a permis d’offrir aux enfants un merveilleux complément scolaire qui leur donne envie d’apprendre et qui leur permet de s’entrainer sur tout le programme officiel de leur classe. ♖ FONCTIONNALITES ♖ • Une interface simple, claire et ludique • La synthèse vocale pour accompagner les enfants dans la lecture et la compréhension de texte • Une gestion multi-joueurs permettant la sauvegarde des scores de plusieurs enfants sur un même smartphone ou tablette • Réglage de la taille des textes • Tableau virtuel et calculatrice intégrés • Mode déconnecté disponible pour profiter de nos applications même sans connexion Internet • Synchronisation automatique des contenus • Des résumés de cours qui reprennent les notions fondamentales à connaître par les élèves • Des power ups spécialement conçus pour motiver et donner petit un coup de pouce ! ★ App sélectionnée dans les tops du guide Les meilleures applications pour enfants 2015 - par la Souris Grise ★ ♫ TEMOIGNAGES DE PARENTS ♫ ‣ "L’application pour réviser ou se remettre à niveau – Enfin une application ludique où mon fils peut apprendre et améliorer ses notes, il y a plein d’exercices, un résumé du cours, un grand bravo pour cette application." ‣ " Mon fils est en 5ème, cela lui permet de faire d’autres exercices (correspondant exactement au programme) que les 3-4 proposés sur son livre. Merci infiniment. De plus c’est plus ludique sur tablette que sur le papier. Je recommande" ★ CE QU'EN DISENT LES ENSEIGNANTS ★ ‣ "Cette application rencontre un franc succès auprès de mes élèves en remise à niveau. Chacun d’entre eux éprouve le besoin de travailler des points différents. La tablette leur permet de définir leur progression personnelle et de travailler à leur rythme. Ils peuvent me solliciter à la moindre difficulté ou incompréhension, ce qui rend – à mon sens – la séance nettement plus productive." ‣ "En plus des séances individuelles, j’utilise iTooch en classe entière en vidéo-projection et les élèves “accrochent” vraiment. Le côté ludique du travail et les animations de la mascotte plaisent vraiment. Les élèves ayant une tablette à la maison m’ont même demandé où acheter l’application !" ☀ L'APPLICATION CONTIENT : ☀ ✓ 4 thèmes : Nombres et Calculs, Grandeurs et Mesures, Gestion de données, Géométrie ✓ 40 chapitres par titre, avec résumé de cours, exemples et dessins ✓ 1 248 questions par titre avec indices et réponses détaillées ➡ iTooch Maths 5ème réunit de loin la plus grande base d'exercices pour le collège sur Google Play. Retrouvez également notre application iTooch Français 5ème sur Google Play. Les applications iTooch offrent une solution de soutien scolaire mobile pour les classes de CP, CE1, CE2, CM1, CM2, 6e, 5e, 4e et 3e en Mathématiques, Français, Anglais et Physique-Chimie. ***A la demande de nombreux utilisateurs qui souhaitent bénéficier d'une application gratuite, nous mettons à disposition une version gratuite intégrant de la publicité. Cette option nous permet de rendre accessible nos contenus au plus grand nombre. La publicité peut être supprimée à tout moment très simplement au travers d'un achat dans l'app. Une version de l’application sans publicité et dédiée aux enseignants et aux établissements scolaires est disponible. description: ★ ★ ★ Leave the as soon as possible the most dangerous area of ​​Chernobyl, a ride on the legendary Soviet UAZ, zatyunenguyte his car under the power structures of the Soviet Union ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Neto advertising banners ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Warning - Dear players, the big request to unsubscribe you can report bugs and wishes in the comments. ★ ★ ★ In this game you have to go to "the Zone" in the role of a carefree young driver. Raced himself on the roads in the area of ​​Pripyat, but on the way it has got a blind dog-mutant. Not having time to slow down, our hero took down the beast and broke his "Gazelle". Waking up after a few hours of oblivion, the guy noted with surprise that he was still alive, and also noticed garages near the scene of the accident, which rot of crooked trees ... Hoping he went there and found "Zaporozhets." This is certainly not a "Gazelle", thought the boy, but it's better than nothing, he thought, and began Kolupaev in the vehicle's ignition. Here control of his car and to be a player. First there will be enough fuel and bend the motor. As we move to the "zone", will give you the funds for which you can buy fuel, improve engine and even get a "UAZ". Where all of this to take in godforsaken hole? And who knows what other secrets it keeps a deserted place called "Exclusion Zone" ... Your job is something to leave the area as quickly as possible. Key features include: * Dynamic gameplay * Beautiful graphics * Atmosphere abandoned Soviet city. * Four types of technology (ZAZ, UAZ, ZIL, T-72) c the opportunity to paint them. * The ability to upgrade any equipment (wheels, transmission, engine etc.) * Realistic physics

description: Unscramble Anagram is a fun new anagram game! Twist, twirl, mix, and unscramble your way through text to find as many words as you can! Exercise your brain and try to beat your own or your friends top scores. Anagrams are more fun than ever - PLAY NOW! ***SIMPLE, YET ADDICTIVE!*** Look at the letters - spell words. If you get stuck then twist, twirl, and jumble the letters up to open your mind to new word possibilities! ***GREAT FOR KIDS AND ADULTS!*** Unscramble Anagram features 4 different difficulties: easy, normal, hard, and expert. Kids and adults will find the challenge that's right for them! ***TWO GREAT GAME MODES!*** * Classic: This mode starts you with a time of 2 minutes. Find as many words as you can before the timer expires. If you find the longest word you get to move on to the next round. * Puzzle: This mode is for the perfectionist. You win by finding every single word in the word list. ***TAKE ON THE CHALLENGE!*** Try to earn 3 stars for each game mode and each difficulty. Are you fast and smart enough to win them all? ***MODERN, SIMPLE DESIGN!*** Our beautifully simple graphic design allows you to focus on what's most important: unscrambling anagrams!
release_text: * Added Google Play Games achievements and leaderboards * Fixed bug - no longer have to wait for the round timer to end if you find all the words in a round in classic mode

description: MedCalc 3000 Cardiac MedCalc 3000 is the most popular and comprehensive Medical Calculator system on the web. It has been highly acclaimed, reviewed and tested over the last 17 years. MedCalc 3000 Cardiac encompasses pertinent medical equations, clinical criteria sets, decision tree tools and dose/unit converters used every day by Cardiovascular specialists. With the growing emphasis on Evidence-Based Medicine, there has never been a greater need for a system such as MedCalc 3000. Now you can put this invaluable resource in the palm of your hand! Equations included: Blood Pressure Percentiles in Children Carbon Dioxide Production Cardiac Output Friedewald Equation for Low Density Lipoprotein Gorlin Formula for Valve Area International Normalized Ratio of PT Mean Vascular Pressures Oxygen Consumption Oxygen Content of Blood Oxygenation Index (OI) paO2 / FIO2 Ratio Pressure Adjusted Heart Rate Pulmonary Vascular Resistance Pulse Pressure Variation QT Interval Correction Respiratory Quotient Right to Left Shunt Fraction Qs/Qt Systemic Vascular Resistance Systolic Pressure Variation Clinical Criteria Sets included: Arrhythmogenic Right Ventricular Dysplasia Atrial Fibrillation and Arterial Thromboembolism Risk Atrial Fibrillation CHADS(2) Score for Stroke Risk Atrial Fibrillation Five Year Risk of Stroke or Death Atrial Fibrillation Five Year Risk of Stroke Cardiac Risk Index Surgeries (Lee) Cardiac Risk Index in Noncardiac Surgery (Detsky et. al.) Cardiac Risk Index in Noncardiac Surgery (Goldman, et. al.) Cardiac Surgery Risk Assesment Scale (UPMC Shadyside Hospital, 2002) DVT Probability: Ambulatory Score System (Constans, 2003 paper) DVT Probability: Kahn Score System DVT Probability: St. Andre Score System DVT Probability: Wells Score System Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome IV Endocarditis Duke Criteria EuroSCORE for Cardiac Surgery Risk Assessment Framingham 10 Year Coronary Risk Prediction (1998) Framingham 10 Year Risk of General Cardiovascular Disease (2008) GRACE Score for Acute Coronary Syndrome Prognosis Intracranial Bleeding Risk from Thrombolytic Therapy Jones Criteria Kawasaki Disease Left Atrial Thrombus Resolution in Mitral Stenosis Patients on Anticoagulation M.I. Criteria for Likelyhood in LBBB Metabolic Syndrome Criteria (multiple versions) MODS Score: Multiple Organ Dysfunction Non Q Wave Myocardial Infarction Pacer Need After Heart Valve Surgery Panic Disorder Screener Pneumonia Risk in Post Operative Period of Non-Cardiac Surgery PROCAM Risk Score (Munster Heart Study) PTCA Complication Prediction Score (death, MI, urgent bypass) PTCA Mortality Prediction Renal Artery Stenosis Prediction Rule Respiratory Failure Risk in Post Operative Period of Non-Cardiac Surgery Romhilt-Estes Criteria for Left Ventricular Hypertrophy Stress Test Outcome Risk Factors Stroke Risk in Patients 55-84 Years Old (Framingham data) Syncope Risk Prediction Systolic Murmur Significance Probability Thrombolysis in Myocardial Infarction (TIMI) Scores Unstable Angina and Tirofiban Benefit Prediction Unstable Angina Outcome Prediction and Stratification (multiple) Warfarin Weekly Dose Estimate in Non-rheumatic A-fib Decision Trees included: Aortic Stenosis and Valve Replacement Prediction Inferior Wall Myocardial Infarction Diagnosis Left Ventricular Capture Loss in Resynchronization Biventricular Pacing M.I. Prediction Decision Obesity Management Guidelines Perioperative Cardiac Evaluation Smoking Cessation and Intervention Suggested Management of Raised Lipid Levels Warfarin Dosing Nomograms (multiple) To practice, teach and learn medicine based on solid, literature based evidence, MedCalc 3000 provides easy to use, interactive tools for your Evidence-Based Medicine.
release_text: Many new calculators including the ACC/AHA risk calculator, Reynolds Scores and much more.

description: [Free] An intellectual learning experience on your smartphone! Enjoy drawing by tapping numbers! Learning numbers is fun when children can draw the animals and vehicles that they love! As they tap numbers in sequence, children draw the animals and vehicles that they love! This is an educational app, based on "connect dot to dot", aimed at children aged three or over, who have started to learn numbers. ★How to play★ 1. Select a picture of an animal or vehicle. → [Intellectual education point] Children can learn to recognize familiar objects such as animals and vehicles from illustrations aimed at preschoolers. 2. Tap the dots starting from 1 up to 20, in order. → [Intellectual education point] Children can learn numbers from 1 to 20. → [Intellectual education point] Connecting the dots together while imagining how the illustration will look once complete will develop a child's "ability to imagine" and "ability to form". 3. Complete the illustration within 60 seconds to clear the challenge! Fun music plays in the background, and there is a sound effect every time you tap the illustration. → [Intellectual education point]Develops a child's "ability to challenge", as they want to complete the puzzle within the time frame. 4. If you cannot complete the puzzle within 60 seconds, a comical sound effect is played to amuse you. → [Intellectual education point] This will develop a child's "ability to persist", making them want to give it one more try. ★Recommended ages★ Children aged 3 to 6 Both a parent and child can enjoy playing it together. ★Feature 1★ - Offers 18 different illustrations of animals and vehicles that children and infants love! Car, boat, sandwich, smartphone, monkey, elephant, birthday cakes, shaved ice, house, pencil, chick, whale, train, bicycle, airplane, umbrella, dog, cat → What's more, each illustration has its own sound effects, so they are full of fun elements that you can enjoy even after you have completed the puzzle! The app uses colors that are easy for infants to recognize, so it can be used as educational material to help even infants of only 36 months to learn their numbers. ★Feature 2★ - Adds game elements to "connect dot to dot"! By requiring a child to clear the puzzle within the prescribed time frame of 60 seconds, this app can provide them with a "feeling of accomplishment". What's more, the app offers a help mode with a "rubi" (readings) function for preschoolers, who have difficulty recognizing numbers! This number-learning material helps children to learn numbers willingly, rather than forcing them to memorize numbers against their will. This is a free app and you will never be prompted to add pay songs or be concerned about your child purchasing them by mistake. You can use it without worry. ★Recommended uses★ ・As an educational app for teaching numbers to children ・As an app for developing the sensitivity of children who like drawing ・As an app for developing a child's "ability to imagine", "ability to form", and "ability to associate" ・As educational material for children who love animals and vehicles ・For children who love objects that produce sound when touched ・As a fun tool for children who won't stop crying ・As a tool to give to your child on holidays when you are too tired to play with him or her ・As a tool for children to kill time while waiting or traveling ・As a tool for a parent and child who want to play together Besides the uses listed above, you can enjoy learning and playing with the app in many other ways!

Take your road cycling experience one step further with Runtastic Road Bike, the best app for cycling fans. It turns your smartphone into a genius GPS cycling computer with 50+ insightful features & compatible bike hardware. The Runtastic Road Bike app has been developed with the needs of road cyclists in mind & offers everything they could require. Runtastic Road Bike is ideal for all types of cycling activities, be it a casual ride around the park, an interval training session, long sunday ride or even racing like in The Tour of Britain. Start tracking your bike rides, races and even tours, benefit from comprehensive analysis & experience cycling on a new level. APP FEATURES & BENEFITS: (limited in Lite version) * Track your cycling via GPS: Distance, duration, speed, elevation gain, pace, calories burned, etc. * LIVE Tracking & Cheers: Go LIVE and show your friends where and how fast you’re cycling & let them cheer you on for more motivation * Route search: Browse & search thousands of cycle routes (available in the app and on Runtastic.com) * Voice Coach: Keeps you posted about your speed, distance, elevation gain, etc. * Maps (Google Maps): Details on your current location * Offline Maps: Download & save maps to your smartphone for low signal areas * Coloured Traces (speed, elevation, climb rate, heart rate, etc.) * Display your current rate of climb during a ride (elevation gain/minute) * Show current grade in % * Determine cadence & speed during your velo tours with the Runtastic Speed & Cadence Sensor (Bluetooth Low Energy) * Heart rate measurement (with additional hardware) * Configure your display: You choose which values are shown during your rides * Auto Pause: No need to manually stop & start activities during short breaks (with Runtastic Speed & Cadence Sensor) * Music: Create a playlist for your rides & activate your Powersong to boost motivation! * Wind & weather conditions * Detailed post-tour analysis incl. time rode uphill, downhill, flat, as well as graphs & training progress * Open Street Map/Open Cycle Map Integration: Plan bike tours & discover new routes * Share your routes & success on Google+, Facebook, Twitter and via email COMPATIBLE BIKE HARDWARE: * Runtastic Heart Rate Combo Monitor * Runtastic Speed & Cadence Sensor (Bluetooth Low Energy) * Runtastic Bike Case for Android Smartphones * Runtastic Sports Armband You can upload all your cycling workouts to Runtastic.com where they’re automatically added to your training log. Detailed information on your bike activities, comparisons with your friends, as well as further benefits help you stay motivated, improve your race times & reach your personal training goals. Next stop, Tour de France! Get the Runtastic Road Bike app now!
release_text: New in 2.2: * Improved stability and some minor bug fixes New in 2.0: * Runtastic Speed & Cadence Sensor (Bluetooth Low Energy) integration: Measure your cadence and exact speed, as you turn your smartphone into a professional cycling computer * New languages: Turkish & Portuguese now available

Homework is an app that you will use for several semesters. Reading homework every day can be a challenge for both the child and parents. Complementing and variety to the usual läxläsnings routines can use this application. When homework is getting monotonous or you need variety in their homework is homework a great tool. description: The first alarm clock that says what you want!!! Wake up with your own voice or the voice of the person you love with the record vocal function or set your "personalized sentence" and talking alarm clock will use it to wake you up. Moreover Talking Alarm Clock tells you the current time! To snooze the alarm you can simply shake the phone. Talking alarm clock is further provided with large snooze button to prevent you from accidentally turning off the alarm. **** If the "Talking Alarm Clock" doesn't work, try to do this in your phone: Go to "Setting"-> "Voice input and output"-> "Text to speech setting"->"Install voice data" ***** Supported languages: italian, english, spanish, french, german (language automatically selected). **** Conflicts with other programs: - Task Manager If you use Taskmanagers apps such as "Advanced Task Killer" you must put "Talking AlarmClock" on the exclusion list (ignore list) since these tools can kill the alarm service used by "Talking AlarmClock" compromising functionality.

The Brew Timer is for brewers, professional and amateur alike, who need a better way to keep track of their brew during the brew day. The application allows the brewer to create individual entries for the timing of different brewing events like the addition of hops, spices, a wort chiller, etc. These events can also include a post-boil steeping time, allowing brewers to keep track of additional lengths of time after the boil ends. These events can be grouped together as a Brew Session and can be saved to device memory in a Recipe Profile that can then be loaded when needed for future use. Each Recipe Profile contains all the events needed for a complete brew session. Brew Timer Features: - Create, save, load, and delete multiple Recipe Profiles. - Each Recipe Profile can contain events for all timed brewing processes. - The Brew Timer can sound a user selected alarm and/or vibrate when an event needs your attention. - Events can be added, edited, or removed while the the timer is running in case a modification needs to be made on the fly. - Color-coding of individual event entry’s remaining time lets you quickly determine how soon an event will trigger. - The Brew Timer can be paused and resumed at any time. The Brew Timer is also great for timing coffee roasting, baking or anything else you may need to keep track of multiple timing events. Is there something you would like to see in The Brew Timer? I have a list of other desired features that other brewers have emailed me, send me an email and tell me what you want! ( brewtimer@humanjoe.com )
release_text: 0.9.47 - Found a couple of small bugs that were setting off event alarms at wrong time. It was annoying so I wanted to get a fix out quickly. 0.9.46 - Added code to allow the event alarms to be heard while on a phone call. - Added a new feature that lets the user enable a Pre-Event Notification. A Pre-Event Notification is an alarm that occurs a set number of seconds before an actual event happens allowing the user to prepare. - Added ability to adjust the font size of on screen text.

description: Blackjack Trainer is the top blackjack game and strategy trainer for Android today. First of all, it offers a fully featured and highly customizable blackjack game. The user is given all the options available in casinos around the world: stand, hit, double, split and surrender (optional; see below). Moreover, the dealer peeks for blackjack and offers insurance (or even money) if the dealer's "up card" is an ace. All common rule variations have been implemented in Blackjack Trainer. Specifically, the user can choose among the following set of rules: - Five different shoe sizes (1, 2, 4, 6, or 8 decks). - Dealer hits or stands on soft 17. - Blackjack pays either 3-to-2, or 6-to-5. - Surrender is allowed or not. - Player can split up to 2, 3, or 4 hands. - Doubling after splitting is allowed or not. - Ace re-splitting is allowed or not. Unlike many other blackjack games in the market, the user does not need to buy new chips to continue using Blackjack Trainer. He/she will be initially provided with $1500 and his/her chips will be fully replenished in case of bankruptcy. Conveniently, we keep track of the user's stats throughout, including wins, pushes, losses, blackjacks, profit/loss and correct choices according to blackjack's basic strategy. To take full advantage of our training features, the user is encouraged to buy our premium package. This upgrade unlocks access to an in-game odds calculator, which displays the *exact* expected return of every choice the user faces. That way, the user can learn what is the correct choice in every situation and can even assess how costly a mistake can be. Other very convenient features include highlighting the best choice according to basic strategy, as well as an engine that evaluates user choices and indicates the correct play in case of a mistake. We are also proud to feature a highly interactive and user-friendly *hand analyzer* in Blackjack Trainer, which allows the user to visually specify particular combinations of player and dealer hands, and get feedback on the exact expected outcome of every play, as well as the preferred choice. The training features are fully sensitive to rule changes and will offer accurate results for every chosen set of rules. We believe that giving the user access to the mathematics behind blackjack will greatly improve his/her understanding of the game. Ever wondered why you should stand on a 7 and a 5 against a dealer's 6 in an 8-deck game? Or how terrible would it be to hit instead? You have come to the right place! We are always eager to hear from you. If you would like to provide feedback/comments about Blackjack Trainer, please contact us at marioga.development@gmail.com

With this program you can easily align your satellite dish. To determine the satellite dish direction, you should choose your satellite from dropdown list, come near the dish, wait for the best accuracy, fix your position (long tap or menu), and moving away, get your current azimuth, most closely matching the nominal azimuth. The program uses GPS to determine your location, its accuracy is about 5 meters, so for the most accurate determination of your current azimuth you should move 50-100 meters (150-300 feet) away. ADFREE (donate) version Dish pointer helper. Google maps view. If You have ANY problems/suggestions or You want to help me translate the program into your language, please contact me on my email. artemkaxboy@gmail.com

Dungeon Nightmares II has been announced on Steam Greenlight! Please take your time to VOTE "YES" if you want to see Dungeon Nightmares released on Android. http://www.dungeonnightmares.com/greenlight http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=326607919 Thank you for your support :) ===== IMPORTANT: Old devices will take long to load the game on the black message screen. Please allow 1 to 2 minutes to load (tested on iPhone 4). Thank you. ========== Android Rundown review: 8.5/10 "Wrapping up, I can’t really think of significant flaws in Dungeon Nightmares. Maybe the graphics could be a bit better and the dungeon rooms could have more variety with more objects of interest, and the story could be richer, but really, it’s fine the way it is. I want to say that it’s a great “screamer”, but I really think that it would be a bit insulting, because Dungeon Nightmares is a great horror game." http://www.androidrundown.com/app-rundown/dungeon-nightmares-review/ 148Apps review: 4/5 "Dungeon Nightmares is truly one of the most immersive and scariest experiences on iOS for some time." http://www.148apps.com/reviews/dungeon-nightmares-review/ AppDaily.ru review: 4/5 (translated) "So, if you are alien horror, if you do not check off their nerves on the strength, if you are not afraid Screamer and want to get a new dose of adrenaline - this game is for you. Here and dark corridors, and disturbing the heart sounds, and a large number of rooms with "surprises" await players and Screamer - anything to get the blood to the player froze." http://appdaily.ru/releases/216-dungeon-nightmares-samaya-strashnaya-atmosfera-podzemele.html ========== Warning: This game contains scenes that will scare you ========== Dungeon Nightmares has been called the SCARIEST game on mobile by players. Every night you go to bed, you find yourself in an endless nightmare that you must escape from. The dungeon is littered with items for you to collect, including Candles that help light up your path. But be warned, you will not be alone in there. You must survive each night and progress to another to find more clues about this nightmare. What do these nightmares mean? Who is that girl? this is something for you to find out... ========== FEATURES - Intense scary atmosphere - Combat-less gameplay - Difficulty scales with each night you survive - Diverse range of "horrors" in the dungeon - Dynamic AI for enemies that changes based on how you play - Fully 3D level design - Rich 3D surround sound (headphones recommended) - Graphical special effects (fog, bokeh particles) - Traditional dual stick controls - Intuitive touch controls for interaction - Powered by Unity3D ========== Follow our Twitter @kmonkeyblog

description: Crystal Storm offers an eclectic mix of action dashing and puzzle fun, set against an oriental backdrop. Dissolve crystals of the same color by tapping them. In Crystal Storm, the player can look forward to 120 regularly updated and expanded levels. The player must demonstrate speed and tactical skill in equal measures. While levels with time limits provide an adrenaline boost, you can puzzle at your leisure in the move-based levels. Explosive Extras ignite a veritable firework and offer the player tactical help in reaching the five different level objectives. New elements are constantly added over the course of the game. These range from destructible objects to the containment of spreading infections. The game experience is rounded off with the use of Facebook. Players can compare their progress with friends playing on any system and give them a helping hand if needed. There are over 200 Achievements to unlock and share with friends. Gameplay features • 120 individually designed levels with various goals • Breath-taking HD graphics and a bombastic soundscape • Additional challenges with over 200 Achievements • Powerful Relics to help master difficult sections of levels • Rankings and lots of other online features • Collections with alternative graphics sets and special game bonuses Game modes • Play against time • Ponder and plan your next move in Tactics Levels. • Achieve a points target in Score Levels • Collect a set number of colored crystals • Clear the grid of Boulders, Seals and Runes • Grab treasures by moving them to the bottom of the grid

description: Do your girls love little ponies, cute horses, and cool unicorns? Do they love fairy tales and puzzles too? Look no further. My Pony Games for Girls: Little Pony Jigsaw Puzzles for Kids and Toddlers who Love Horses and Princess Unicorn Ponies for Free is a fun animated puzzle game for toddlers, preschoolers, and girls from ages 1 to 6. The app includes twelve different kid and toddler friendly, jigsaw-style puzzles with options to change the number of pieces and remove other helpers. The puzzles start off easy to play and can be made more challenging- perfect for the little one in your life who loves a little pony, cool unicorns, and fun horses! The puzzles come to life once complete with scenes including fairy tale castles, my pony princesses, and cute flying unicorns! This high quality pony game puzzle app features virtual jigsaw pieces for learning shape recognition and matching- great for educational purposes or just for fun! Good for one of your child's first puzzle games. Features: * Fun, cool, and creative graphics by illustrator Tim Demeter. * 12 different of my fun little princess pony puzzles to choose from in this game! * Fun interactive stars and bubbles to pop, animated ponies, and flying unicorns at the end of puzzles! * Choose your own difficulty! Increase the number of pieces from 9 up to 24 as your child's fine motor and spatial skills improve! * Easy for kids to use and control.

description: Police Radar is a free radar scanner application for detecting the nearby presence of law enforcement officials. You would be wise not to leave home without. Consider, this day in age when police are roaming the streets all over the place, wouldn't you love to be able to tip the balance to your side and detect them before they detect you? With this handy police radar, you can do just that! Police Radar is meant for entertainment purposes only. The accuracy of the radar cannot be guaranteed to be good enough to allow the user to avoid being detected by police. Please do not speed, and please obey all local laws. Remember, crime doesn't pay. But fooling your friends with this sweet police radar app does! Since the last update of Police Radar, many cool new and exciting features have been implemented, including: Pigspeak - Pigspeak is the patented new police early warning system. Turning it on will allow the app to actually talk to you, warning you of nearby police activity! Recent Activity List - The app now stores a backlog of all of the recent police activity that you picked up on the radar. Share Police Radar with your friends - The app now allows you to share it with your friends so that you can quickly and easily get your whole crew on the Police Radar bandwagon. I am always looking to update and improve upon my apps, especially based on feedback from users. After all, this app is for you guys. If you have any ideas on how to make it better, shoot me an e-mail or leave a comment and I will get to it ASAP. Let's make Police Radar the best app it can possibly be! Police Radar was tested on a Galaxy S II device, and should work properly on most Androids. Let me know if you have issues. Once again, thank you for trying Police Radar, now get our there and start scanning! P.S. if you don't want ads, there is an ad-free version available too. Check it out!

description: Follow the step-by-step instructions to build space cars and star wars vehicles AdFree. Playing is fun and will add a lot the development of motoric skills. This puzzle game is really for all ages. Bring the bricks together and follow the color pattern. Get ready to fly in space! When the alarm sounds, it’s time for action! These space examples have everything you'll need, from space motors to star wars fighters. Unload the goods with these transporters and air cars. A brave star trek team is ready to launch the space flyers into the stars. The vehicles are divided into sub-models for easy building and instant play! Create those elegot figures and get the real and legot figures. The larger pieces allow children to use the blocks with their own small hands. They will lose their imagination with these kinds of three dimensional designs. Let your creativity go and try alternative colors or add small changes. Let the youngest play and be surprised with the results. These games are intended to play with colorful interlocking plastic building block toys. The blocks can be assembled and connected in many ways to construct such objects as vehicles, animals, buildings and even working robots. Anything constructed can be taken apart again and the pieces can be used to make other objects. Help your child as a parent and you will be surprised how fast the children will pick up the game. Take a picture and post the creation online. Happy faces will follow and your family and friend club will enjoy. This kid puzzle needs a set of building blocks like lego or mega bloks. Start with a basic set and have fun exploring this game. The step-by-step instructions are intended to let your kids get more out of these beautiful toys. Most duplo or mega blocks come with limited instructions. These instructions will help you to get the most out of the toys. There are also alternative sets available. If you like to play with building blocks, then this puzzle game is definitely for you! Have fun with these great constructions. Features: - Easy and clean user interface - Free puzzles - Nice graphics - For all ages - Share creations on social media - AdFree

Threema is a mobile messaging app that puts security and privacy first. With true end-to-end encryption, you can rest assured that only you and the intended recipient can read your messages. You can use Threema completely anonymously, without giving away personal information such as phone numbers or email addresses. Your messages will be deleted from our servers immediately after being delivered. Therefore, you're perfectly protected against data abuse. -- SECURE END-TO-END ENCRYPTION Compared to other popular messaging apps (including those claiming to use encryption), even we as the server operator have absolutely no way to read your messages. -- HIGH LEVEL OF DATA PROTECTION Threema takes data privacy very seriously. We strive to store only the absolutely necessary information for the shortest possible time. We guarantee that we do not collect, evaluate or sell customer data. That is our promise. -- STANDARD FEATURES Threema is not only secure but also very user friendly and covers the basic features of a mobile messenger. • create Poll • write text messages • send videos and pictures • share locations • send voice messages • create group chats and add new members • synchronize your contacts (optional) -- SPECIAL FEATURES Threema differs from other mobile messenger by some special features. • all text and voice messages as well as pictures, videos, and GPS locations are asymmetrically end-to-end encrypted • even group chats are end-to-end encrypted • verify the identity of a contact by scanning their personal QR code • anonymous instant messaging • nobody can read or evaluate your data • local files are stored encrypted on your mobile phone The Threema application is constantly being improved. -- PERMISSIONS Threema requires the following permissions while installing the application. These permissions are only used if the corresponding functionality is requested. • Read your contacts / modify your contacts: used for address book synchronization. When the synchronization is turned off, your contact data is not read or modified. • Receive text messages: used for automatically linking your Threema ID to a mobile phone number. This permission is used only during the initial verification process. • Precise location (GPS and network based): used for "send location" feature. • Add or remove accounts, find accounts, create accounts: required for contact synchronization and integration in Android's account management. • Modify or delete the contents of your USB storage: required for storing media files (images, videos, audio). • Read phone status and identity: pre-fills your phone number if linking is desired. Only used during initial setup. • Threema's functionality can be futher extended by separately downloadable plugins which may require additional permissions (e.g. access to camera, microphone). -- WHY IS THREEMA A PAID APP Threema only requires a one-time fee. There are NO recurring charges. Alle Züge auf einen Blick: Mit dem DB Zugradar Verfolgen Sie die Züge des DB Nah- und Fernverkehrs live im DB Zugradar und grenzen Sie durch den Filter die Darstellung der Verkehrsmittel (Fernverkehr (ICE und IC/EC), Nahverkehr) und Bahnhöfe ein. Der DB Zugradar stellt auf einer dynamischen Karte das gesamte Streckennetz der Deutschen Bahn dar. Mit dem DB Zugradar können Sie das aktuelle Betriebsgeschehen aller DB-Züge auf einen Blick verfolgen. Damit wird Ihnen beispielsweise die aktuelle Situation einer ausgewählten Zugfahrt schnell und einfach visualisiert und die Pünktlichkeitslage in Echtzeit angezeigt. Wichtige Hinweise zur Darstellung: Die Zugpositionen werden auf Basis von Prognosen berechnet. Es werden keine Positionsdaten verwendet (GPS). Dies kann zu kleineren Unschärfen in der Darstellung auf der Karte führen. All supplied at a glance: The DB Zugradar Trace the course of the DB local and long distance traffic in the live DB Zugradar and borders through the filter, the representation of transport (long-distance transport (ICE and IC / EC), local transport) and Stations. The DB Zugradar presents on a dynamic map of the entire route network of the Deutsche Bahn dar. With the DB Zugradar you will find markings follow the current operating events of all DB-fed at a glance. To make the example, the current situation of a ausgewählten schedule quickly visualized and the Pünktlichkeitslage in real time. Important notes on presentation: The slide positions are calculated on the basis of forecasts. No position data used (GPS). This can lead to smaller blurred in the representation on the map.

description: The truck workers have done their job, they made a lot of garbage out there. Real heavy dirt. We need to clean it up and deliver the cargo to the explicit place. Get your recycle dump truck and get the hell out there, it isn’t moving itself! Drive your dump truck like a champion! We all expect a massive parking performance, not a garbage one. Recycle Dump Truck Simulation Drive this way, drive that way.. let’s do this! Parking is one of your tasks in this parking simulation, but it’s not your main task. You need to get the heavy dirt cargo and garbage to the right place, deliver the cargo on the requested spot. They can recycle all of it and use it again on other dump places. So your job is not done soon, you can show your skills on different levels. Are you done with parking the car, bus or plane? Don’t want to drive any heavy train anymore? Start to drive this recycle dump truck here in this town, use your imagination in this parking simulation game. Deliver the cargo and dump truck dirt to the right place, get rid of the garbage and park your truck in the parking spot in time. It’s time based, so please drive as fast as possible! Features: + 20 different dirt recycle challenges + 4 cargo cars / heavy dump truck to use + Limited time to drive the garbage + 2 different points of view + On-screen steering wheel, accelerate / brake pedals and cargo truck control You’re ready to clean all the dirt garbage and deliver that nasty cargo with your truck to the right spot? And in time? That will be heavy to complete in this recycle dump truck simulation game. But OK, let’s start this cargo drive and parking mission without fear. Be focussed to drive the cargo with your dump truck fast and good! Finish it with parking skills. Please give us some support by rating our game on Google Play or follow us: Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/VascoGames Twitter - https://twitter.com/VascoGames YouTube - http://goo.gl/HChVVx
