description: Space STG 3 - Empire of Extinction is a sequel to the real-time strategy game. It provides Real-time strategy gameplay that recaptures and improves on the magic of the original game. You can find there In-universe campaigns and a lot of highly detailed units. It is also designed to focus more heavily on the multiplayer aspect. Immerse yourself in a mortal war of clans. Explore solar systems, manage cities, develop technology and create space fleet and massive armies. Delightfully challenging, yet simple enough to grasp. FEATURES: ★ Achievements and Leaderboard provided by Google Services ★ New development features will enhance the game experience, ★ New units and gameplay mechanics, ★ New weapons of war, ★ New graphics design, ★ Groundbreaking single-player campaign with missions and rewards ★ Over the course of 40 campaign missions, ★ Multiplayer mode - play with friends! Available through Google Play Service, ★ Full multiplayer support, with new competitive features and matchmaking utilities, ★ Cloud save via Google Services, ★ English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Polish, Serbian, Turkish, Russian, Italian and more languages! ★ ★ ★ BUILDINGS ★ ★ ★ ☆ Main base - Main base provides population limit number. Every ship and defence unit require population. ☆ Metal mine - Metal mining provides metal minerals. ☆ Crystal mine - Crystal mining provide crystal minerals. ☆ Graphen mine - Graphen mine provide mining and production of graphen minerals. ☆ Power plant - Power plant produces energy in planet. Low energy on planet causes slower building. ☆ Ship yard - Provide the ability to buy spacecraft. Every level provide increase building speed of units. ☆ Defense building - Defense building provide the ability to buy planetary defenses. Every level provide increase building speed of units. ☆ Laboratory - Research and develop technology. Provides the ability to buy technology. Every level provide increase building speed of units. ★ ★ ★ SHIPS ★ ★ ★ ☆ Transporter - It transports minerals from planet to planet. ☆ Colonizer - It colonizes an empty planet which allows you to build buildings on that planet. ☆ Fighter - Light and very fast fighter. It can perform quick attack. ☆ Warrior - Medium class spaceship. Transformation ability increase guns power. ☆ Bomber - Bomber has the ability to destroy buildings and defence from distance. ☆ Warship - Powerful spacecraft with ability to shoot from large distance. ☆ Protector - Protector has ability to hide through battle. ☆ Mother ship - Most powerful unit with ability to change destination through space flight. Big blast weapons allows to destroy several ships pararell. ★ ★ ★ DEFENCE ★ ★ ★ ☆ Soldier - Soldier is weak short distance defence unit. ☆ Xr-10 - Xkr-10 is weak long distance defence option. ☆ Mech warrior - Mech warrior average short distance defence unit. ☆ Xr-x10 adv - Xkr-x10 advanced is heavy mech with decent long rangee attack level. ☆ Vector - Vector is big strong defence unit. ☆ Plasma cannon - Big cannon can destroy several ships palarell. ★ ★ ★ TECHNOLOGY ★ ★ ★ ☆ Defence station - Defence station defends space. It has long distance weapon to maintain order in space. Send it into space. ☆ Mining station - Mining station allows you to mine minerals from asteroids. Send it to an asteroid and choose mineral to mine. ☆ Merchant station - Merchant station provide ability to trade minerals. Send minerals by transporters to station to start exchange minerals. ☆ Defensive shield - Defensive shield enables layer all over the planet. It can defend from nuclear missile, bomber attack and enemy ships invasion. ☆ Invisibility - Makes player's ships invisible. Activate prior to sending. ☆ Missile - It can destroy enemy buildings and defence units on a planet. ☆ Electrical storm - It is a offense/defense option. Use it when enemy ships are near to deal damage. ☆ Probe - Probes provide information about an enemy's buildings, ships, defence and technology.

This Elemental Tower Defense (element TD) take into consideration of elemental weakness of enemy. Use the best combination of element TD to win in the game. There is a element TD summoning system to summon rare tower to aid you. 9 sheep heroes with 45 talents to fight the war with cloud! Want to know why Cloud attack the Sheep Farm? Check out this special "Save Our Earth" video to find out now: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N8ORTgFUBe0 Features: 6 Element Tower Defense 9 Sheep Hero, 45 unique skills Main story and Vortex Portal (side quest) 300 Tower Types & Evolution 1000 level of tower Upgrade Extract 6 Magical Spell Craft Crystal and Equip on Tower Defense Collect Essence to boost your capabilities Explore 10 Enemy Tower Defense Worlds Unique Boss and Enemy with special abilities Collect Balloons, treasure chest and clover. The perfect mix of Tower Defense (TD) and Card Battle Summoning Game play Ensure at least 1 GB of RAM for optimal Game play experience.

description: One Track, your motorbike and a lot of eyes looking at you. Will you be able to make it? Try to get to the finish line as fast as you can and get the qualification. If you are good enough, you will be in the top of the table. You will get a lot of extra points if you can make tricks like flip during race. This game will give the emotion and the passion of the motocross or MX to your mobile. Download it now. It's free only for a limited time!

مطابق تماماً للكتاب من حيث محتوى الصفحة الواحدة وترقيم الصفحات ونوع الخط إمكانية تصفح الكتاب بدون الاتصال بالانترنت إمكانية حفظ علامة عند صفحة معينة و الرجوع إليها لاحقاً يحافظ البرنامج على وضع الشاشة المضاءة لمن أراد الاستمرار بالقراءة لفترة طويلة في حال إغلاق البرنامج عند صفحة معينة و فتحه مرة أخرى سيذهب تلقائياً الى الصفحة التي تم الإغلاق عندها فهرس يسهل الوصول لمحتويات الكتاب خط واضح وإمكانية القراءة بالوضعين الأفقي والشاقولي

*Parents Choice Awards – Toca Kitchen Wins Gold!* Ever wanted to play with your food? Now you can! Toca Boca kids apps bring you Toca Kitchen, where you cook and play with food for four hungry characters. Pick any ingredient and prepare it in your own way! Slice, boil, fry, cook, microwave or mix? And wait for your hungry friend´s response… We created this educational app for kids to give the mud cakes a new face, a complete virtual make-over which the kids will love! The characters fearful reactions to different meals will make you giggle. Does the cat like salty fish? Would the boy eat potatoes and greens? Mix and mismatch you own meal with no high scores or time limits in this fun cooking app. - Four cute characters to cook for - each with their own favorite food! - 12 different ingredients that can be prepared in 180 different ways! - Slice, boil, fry, cook, microwave anything you like! - Professional and fun kids app design! - No rules or stress! - Kid-friendly interface - No in-app purchases - No third party advertising Toca Kitchen is not a game - it's a toy where you and your kids get to explore cooking. What happens if you mix a carrot and then fry it? Will the cat like it? And what is the bull's favorite food? Toca Kitchen supports free play for all ages and is a great way to use your imagination. As with all Toca Boca apps, there are no high scores, time limits or stressful music. Rest assured this app for kids let’s kids play however they want! ABOUT TOCA BOCA APPS Toca Boca is a game studio that makes digital toys for kids. We think playing and having fun is the best way to learn about the world. Therefore we make digital toys and free kids games that help stimulate the imagination, and that you can play together with your kids. Best of all - we do it in a safe way without third-party advertising or in-app purchases.

app_name: 漢字能力検定 あなたは何級？
description: 日本漢字能力検定協会協力による、過去実際に漢検で出題された10級から1級までの漢字問題に答えてあなたの漢字能力を診断します。 手書き文字認識入力機能を使用し、手書きでラクラク漢字を入力。 日本漢字能力検定協会公認の教科書体フォントで読みやすく親しみやすい書体で 学習できます(準1級・1級は除く)。 あなたの漢検力は何級レベル?家族や友達と一緒にみんなで挑戦しよう! ■有料版について 漢字をもっと勉強したくなったら、各級の問題(有料版)に挑戦! 実力を伸ばしたい級をこの無料アプリから簡単購入! 小学一年生レベルの10級から、大学・一般程度の超難関レベルの準1級・1級まで 好きな級を別々に購入できます。 1つの級に平均2,500問、全級で27,000問収録しています。 ※10級から2級までは漢検で使用される教科書体フォントを使用していますが、準1・1級は実際に漢検に出題されるフォントとは異なりますのであらかじめご了- 承ください。 ※診断結果はあくまでも参考結果です。実際の漢検の合格を保証するものではありません。 ※手書き認識入力システムはパナソニック社製「楽ひら」を使用しています。 ※複数の漢検の検定問題を収録しているため、同じ漢字を使用した問題が出題されることがあります。 ※本アプリに収録されている内容は、タブレット用「漢検 あなたは何級？Tab」と同内容のものです。有料版を購入される場合は、それぞれ別に課金が発生します。 【有料問題購入後の基本機能】 問題を購入すると漢字学習に便利なさまざまな機能をご利用できます。 1)検定機能 各級のすべての項目から出題するオリジナル検定です。40分コースと10分コースを選べ 一定の基準で合格・不合格を判定します。 2)漢字訓練 各級の多種多様な漢字問題を選んで学習します。間違えた問題や気になる問題を 保存できるので後で復習できます。 3)MY漢検機能 チェックしておいた漢字問題を呼び出して集中的に補習する機能です。 4)成績閲覧機能 どれだけ漢字を覚えたか、達成率と総合力を確認する機能です。 5)実力テスト あなたの漢字能力がどの程度なのか確認する20問の小テストです。 =収録問題について= 本アプリに収録されている問題は平成23年度迄の検定に対応した過去問が 収録されております。平成24年度以降の検定情報は日本漢字能力検定協会 ホームページをご確認下さい。 ●ご使用に際して 【文字認識について】 手書きした文字の形や書き順などによっては認識精度が 悪くなることがあります。 ■オススメモバイルサイト『漢検モバイル』 http://ksp.kentei.bz ■Twitterでも漢検！『今日の漢検』 難読漢字や当て字、故事ことわざや四字熟語の問題を毎日無料で配信します。 いますぐ @kanken_today をフォロー。 「漢検」「日本漢字能力検定」は登録商標です。 This traditional Cuckoo clock for Chime Time sounds every half-hour, and the time every hour. READ ME: When you install this clock, there will be no launcher icon for it. When you download the free app Chime Time, this clock will appear inside it. Enjoy!

Create notes hands free! All you have to do is speak - this app converts it into text that can be edited using voice commands. For example, you can just say "next" to move to the next line, say "delete" to delete a word, say "delete 5" to delete 5 words say "delete 10" to delete 10 words and so on. This app is great for creating to-do lists, grocery list, dictation, and other notes in general. You can also share your notes using your favorite app (Gmail, twitter, Google Hangout, SMS, Whatsapp, Viber, Skype, etc). SAMSUNG USERS: IF THE APP IS NOT WORKING MAKE SURE YOUR DEFAULT VOICE RECOGNITION ENGINE IS SET TO GOOGLE Top Free Features ============== * No limits on the size/length of note created - yes you can write your poems, stories and create your legal documents, medical records or any long documents! * Organize your notes by creating up to 10 folders and subfolders * Share your note using your favorite app (Gmail, twitter, Google Hangout, SMS, Whatsapp, Viber, Skype, etc) * Speech recognizer does not time out * Speech recognition in >70 languages * Voice commands in 6 languages (English, French, Spanish, German, Portugese, Russian) * Read back your notes using Text to Speech / Voice synthesis * Different speed and pitch settings for Text to Speech * Font size settings for ease of reading Top Premium Features ================== * No advertisements * Widget to start taking notes with a single touch from your home screen (one touch) * Premium voice commands (e.g. just say "left" to move the cursor left or say "save" to save the note * Save post-processing time by capitalizing first letters of sentences * Unlimited folders and subfolders for complete organization * Create notes using Bluetooth headset (platinum) * Eyesfree talkback mode (platinum) - The app will talk back your speech when you pause during your note making session to let you create notes without even seeing the device! More awesome features are coming soon ... This app requires Android's speech recognition system (Google Search app). Currently voice commands are supported in English, Russian, Spanish, French, German and Portugese. It can still be used for regular speech to text (without voice commands for next line, delete, etc) in almost all languages supported by Android. It also needs Google Text to Speech if you are interested in Text to Speech features in the app. Tags: Notepad, speech to text notepad, voice to text notepad, speech recognition, voice recognition, dictation notepad, to-do list , grocery list, speech to text converter, speech to text notes, voice transcription, voice transcribe, speech transcription, speech transcribe, dictate, transcribe, speech note, voice notepad, voice note
release_text: Free Features =========== + Create up to 10 folders and subfolders to organize your notes! + Navigation drawer for easy access to functionality + Improved user interface + Bug fixes Premium Features ============== + Create UNLIMITED numbers of folders and subfolders to organize your notes!

description: Cansado de longas esperas por seu ônibus? Localize em tempo real a posição dos ônibus da cidade de São Paulo (SPTrans). Não perca mais o ônibus! Com o BusFinder SP é possível acompanhar a localização dos ônibus de qualquer linha da cidade de São Paulo. Recursos: - Lista de linhas favoritas - Atualização automática - Cache dos mapas para menor consumo de dados - Mostra sua localização através do GPS ou da rede - Número ilimitado de linhas (tanto nos favoritos, quanto na exibição dos mapas) - Mostra a rota dos ônibus no mapa Porquê o aplicativo precisa destas permissões? - Comunicação com a internet: para baixar as informações das localizações dos ônibus - Local aproximado e exato: para exibir sua localização no mapa, caso a opção para isto esteja ativa - Armazenamento no cartão SD: para fazer cache dos mapas, consumindo menos dados O aplicativo usa as informações disponibilizadas pelo serviço Olho Vivo da SPTrans. Portanto, caso haja problemas com a localização dos ônibus (ônibus sumindo, ou que não aparecem no mapa), é importante notificar a SPTrans para que o problema seja corrigido. Tired of long waits for your bus? Locate in real time the position of the buses in São Paulo (SPTrans). Do not waste the bus! With BusFinder SP can track the location of any bus line in the city of São Paulo. Resources: - List of favorite lines - Automatic Update - Cache Maps for lower consumption data - Shows your location via GPS or network - Unlimited number of lines (both favorites, and in view of the maps) - Shows the bus route on the map Why these permissions the application needs? - Communication with the Internet: to download the information of the locations of bus - Exact and Approximate Location: to display its location on the map, if the option is active for this - Storage on SD card: to cache the maps, consuming less data The app uses the information provided by the service Watch Live SPTrans. Therefore, if there are problems with the location of the bus (bus disappearing, or that do not appear on the map), it is important to notify the SPTrans the problem is corrected.
release_text: Versão 1.0.3: - Correções de performance e estabilidade - Possibilidade de mover o aplicativo para o cartão SD

description: Girls are crazy about playing these games.She already make a general cleaning and now she need some help of you to make her fresh and pretty too. Make a nice make up, choose a hairstyle and outfit. Best with phones

Tap these cute naughty animated 3D cats/kittens and play music. They are naughty but still very cute. They blink, open their little pink mouths and sing with funny voices. Each kitten corresponds to a piano key with realistic pitch intervals. Thus, you can play as if you were playing the piano. But kittens are much cuter. They are meowing as if they were talking with funny angry voices. You should hear it.

TransMob by Transponders Wait no more, Late no more! TransMob is a mobile application specially developed for public transportation commuters in South-East Queensland region, Australia. The application is built using Translink's official API. TransMob works in all areas that Translink covers: South-east Queensland including Brisbane, Gold Coast, Toowoomba, and many more. All types of services offered by Translink are incorporated inside TransMob: bus, train, and ferry! TransMob aims to be the one-stop solution for public transportation commuters in South-East Queensland region. TransMob provides many useful features wrapped in beautiful, simple and user-friendly design. Currently implemented features: -Nearby stops: see the 25 nearest public transportation stops around your location! -Estimated service arrival time: for each stop, see all the available services and when is the next service (and second next service) will arrive at that particular stop. -Service route map: see the route and all the stops of any services offered by Translink. -Approximate service tracking in the service route map. -Journey Planner: take the most efficient services to get to your destination! -Maintenance news: shows all the service news and updates. -GoCard login: input your registered Go Card number and password to see your current balance & recent travel history! -User's current location tracking in the service route map. Take a look at the blue your location marker-- it will move along the red route line when you're riding the bus. Now you know when to press the stop button! The application will keep on improving-- enhancements and more features are coming soon! Your questions, comments, critiques, and suggestions are highly welcomed, please feel free to contact us ^^ If you encounter any issues or crashes, please kindly report them using the Play Store report feature, or feel free to drop us an email. We love to hear from you! :) Thanks~! -Team Transponders
release_text: UPDATES IN VERSION 1.7.1 **UI FIXES IN LOLLIPOP - Fixed Toolbar that was out of place - Fixed weird drop-down fields' appearance in Journey Planner **BUG FIXES - Various bug fixes, especially in Journey Planner - Fixed login problem in the Go Card login page **MATERIAL DESIGN - App design adjustment to follow Android's new Material design - Missing progress spinner is back! More design enhancements and more features coming soon, thank you always for your patience & interest in TransMob :)

description: Aşkın Frekansı En romantik aşk şarkılarını mı dinlemek istiyorsunuz? Kendi müzik zevkinize göre bir uygulama arıyorsanız, SlowTürk Android uygulaması size en güzel aşk şarkılarını sunuyor. Günün 24 saati, sadece en güzel aşk şarkılarına yer veren SlowTürk Radyo, Türkiye’nin ilk ulusal Türkçe slow müzik radyo istasyonu. Türkiye’nin en beğenilen ve en yeni aşk şarkılarını dinleyebilir, hafızalarda yer edinen unutulmaz klasikleri de SlowTürk’te bulabilirsiniz. Aşkın frekansı SlowTürk’ten siz de vazgeçemeyeceksiniz. Çünkü Türkçe’nin en güzel aşk şarkılarını SlowTürk’te bulacaksınız. Üstelik 24 saat kesintisiz! -------------- Frequency of Love Do you want to listen to the most romantic love songs? If you are searching for an application which is suitable for your own music taste, the SlowTurk application gives you what you want! SlowTurk Radio is the first Turkish slow music radio station which plays the most loved and remembered love songs 24 hours, all the time! You can listen Turkey’s most favourite and the brand new love songs. And also you can find unforgettable and classic love songs at SlowTurk radio. Once you get used to SlowTurk Radio, you can never ever give up listening to it! Because SlowTurk Radio plays for your heart, feeds your soul and it never becomes easy to leave your heart and soul after all! It’s very easy to listen SlowTurk via Android based mobile devices. Directly download SlowTurk application and start listening to the frequency of love!

Before installing the App, please read the details below as this contains important information about the App. Connect to Premier 24 - 168, Premier Elite 12 - 640 and Premier International 412 - 832 control panels using your Android Phone or Tablet. The App requires a ComIP, ComWIFI, ComGSM or Chiron IRIS module connected to a Premier or Premier Elite control panel * Features include: Virtual Keypad. Access your system from the keypad as if you were using a real keypad. Smartkey Allows you to arm, part arm, disarm and reset you alarm system. It also allows you to activate up to 3 outputs (control panel dependent) which can be used to control lighting etc. Event Log. View up to the last 500 log events. The number of the events to be retrieved is programmable. Zone Status. View the status of zones and omit zones. Panel Status. View panel type, firmware version, panel voltage and current consumption (control panel dependent). Tools. Anti-code reset. Generate protected UDL passcode. Site Profiles. Add and delete up to 9 number of pre-defined site profiles. Start Screen. Select which screen the App starts on, Menu, Smartkey or Keypad. Supported Languages. • Bulgarian • Czech • Danish • Dutch • English • Finnish • French • Norwegian • Portuguese • Slovak • Spanish • Swedish Log In User Name: Master Passcode: 123456 Unlocking Please note that this app has been designed to be used by installation engineers. Access to engineering tools menu which includes Anti-code, Protected UDL generation will only be available once the app is unlocked. To unlock the app, go to setting, help and select 'Unlock App' then follow the instructions on the screen. Unlocking of the app will be allowed for genuine installation engineers only after validation has been performed. A unlock code will not be provided to end users. The App will still function as an advanced user App if it is not unlocked. Terms and Conditions The Engineer app (the App) allows you to exercise basic control and run diagnostics of your alarm system including, but not limited to, arming, part arming, disarming and resetting your alarm system. These terms and conditions relate to the App and govern your use of the App with Texecom Limited (Us, Our, We, or Texecom). Details of these terms and conditions can be found at http://www.texe.com/Disclaimer_MobileApps.pdf . By downloading the App you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. * To ensure the very best user experience, please make sure your control panel has the latest firmware. ** Not available on the Premier 24.
release_text: Removed target version to stop crashes in Android 4.4 Made text black for newer versions of Android. Stopped app from relogging in when 'Auto-Login' is enabled. Increase timeouts for connections to help slow connections. Added disconnecting warning to stop issues when panel programmed for ComIP. Smartkey can now be used to control individual areas by touching below the bottom buttons. Fixed issues with keypad not changing from portrait to landscape and back.

description: This is the The Old Reader extension for News+. News+: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.noinnion.android.newsplus The Old Reader is the ultimate social RSS reader for The Open Web. Read, share and discuss. Don't miss a thing. You can create a new account on The Old Reader here: https://theoldreader.com What does it do? The Old Reader allows you to subscribe to your favorite sites so you can stay in the know. Connect with friends to share and discuss articles you love. Send links to your favorite social networks, or save them to Pocket, Instapaper or Readability. What does this service cost? The Old Reader is free for up to 100 feeds. We also offer a premium version for $3/month that has the following features: - Full-text search - Faster feed refresh times - Up to 500 Subscriptions * - 6 months of post storage - Instapaper and Readability integration - Early access to new features * Larger plans are available
release_text: We've finally fixed the sync issue where items marked read/unread on theoldreader.com or from other apps are sync'd with News+. We apologize it took so long to get an update here.

description: Your Home Just Got Smarter Now there’s an app that lets you check in on your home anytime from virtually anywhere: Verizon Home Monitoring and Control. Use your compatible smartphone to see what the kids or dog are up to with remote indoor or outdoor cameras, lock or unlock doors and turn lights on or off; raise or lower your home’s thermostat, do it all from the palm of your hand. You’ve already got a smartphone why not also get a smart home. Verizon Home Monitoring and Control service subscription lets you stay connected to your home from virtually anywhere through your smartphone, tablet or PC. With indoor and outdoor cameras you can - Make sure the kids got home safely from school. - Check up on the pets. - See who’s coming and going or if the storm did any damage in the backyard. Lots of devices to choose from to customize your Home Monitoring and Control service - Sensors for doors and windows can be configured to send a notification to your smartphone when opened - Lights can be switched on and off remotely - Door locks allow you to let in friends and family when keys are forgotten - Thermostats that let you control the temperature and help lower energy costs Your devices work together so a light can turn on when the door is opened and the camera records the activity. See all that your smartphone can do with the Verizon Home Control App. * Home Monitoring and Control Service is provided by Verizon Online LLC. Licensed in NY # 12000302262 by NY State Department of State. VA DJCS #11-6657. You can read our privacy policy at http://www22.verizon.com/about/privacy/policy/ NOTE: If you have a device running Android 4.2 or newer and you are having trouble logging in to DVR, please make sure you update upgrade *ALL* Verizon apps (My FiOS, FiOS Mobile Remote, FiOS Digital Voice, Media Manager and Home Control) in order to ensure that your username/password is saved properly.
release_text: New: o Smart Z-Wave Thermostats purchased from other manufacturers can now be controlled via your Verizon Home Control system (limited functionality) o Landscape viewing for camera details and recording details Fixed: o Improved session timeout experience o Easier app navigation o Notification improvements o Live streaming improvements when a call is received o Alphabetical sorting of Modes o Easy to read energy graphs o Improvements to Smart Thermostat controls o Other Bug Fixes.

description: Coinbox Clicker 2 is here! Improving on the original in every way, Coinbox Clicker 2 has tons of exciting new features to keep you clicking away during your idle moments! Millions of coins? That's nothing. Billions? Trillions? Chump change! Become a multi-quintillionaire again with the most exciting incremental coinbox game ever! >> More Upgrades << Coinbox Clicker 2 has five upgrades and more levels--over 60 upgrades to spend your mountain of money on! >> New Feature: Day/Night Cycle << Watch the day fade into twilight as the sun sets, then see the moon and stars come out at night. Birds fly in the daytime, and sometimes you'll see a comet at night. >> New Feature: Gems << With the new Coin Flick upgrade, you can swipe to launch coins in any direction. Hit the bonus birds to earn gems. Also, those new comets must be good for something, right...? >> New Feature: Accessories << Use your gems to purchase brand-new accessory items, such as a lucky horseshoe that increases coin values, a birdbath that attracts more gem-carrying birds, or mysterious objects that can alter the flow of time itself! Check out the reviews! - "Epic - Best game ever" - "This is beast" - "I already played through the first part and the 2 is 1000000 times better"
release_text: New global leaderboards, so you can compare your screen-tapping prowess with other coinbox clickers worldwide!

description: A very addicted shooter game is out now on the market! Your challenge is to shoot fruit, bottle and can in 3 gameplay modes as fast as you can. Your agility and accuracy will be awarded with extra points. Why am I supposed to slice while I have a gun??? HOW TO PLAY: - Tap to shoot - Classic mode: Avoid dangerous bombs and don’t let fruit fall out - Time mode: Shoot as many bottles as you can. And for each bottle get shot, a little extra time will be added - Action mode: In 90 seconds, keep shooting the cans until they get cracked FEATURES: - 3 gameplay modes : o Classic: fruit shooter o Time: bottle shooter o Action: can shooter - Simple tap control, easy to play and suitable for all ages

Free version with ads: The best graphing and scientific calculator here. As a scientific calculator cFunction supports functions like pow, square roots, trigonometric functions and the logarithm. As mathematical constants, the Euler number e and Pi (π) are supported On top of that with this graphing calculator you can plot (multiple) functions, calculate derivatives, roots, extrema (maxima or minima of a function), inflection points, value table, certain values, definite integrals, intersections of functions and it can convert between degrees and radian. The calculator supports the trigonometric functions sine, cosine, tangent, their hyperbolic representations hyperbolic sine, hyperbolic cosine and hyperbolic tangent and the inverse trigonometric functions sin^−1(x), cos^-1(x), tan^-1(x), coth, cot, acot. Using the calculator you can analyze functions fast and simple so it's perfect for your math classes. Supports english, german, french and spanish. Relevant Tags: Math, Calculator, Scientific Calculator, Graphing Calculator, calculate Derivative, calculate Integral, calculate roots, homework, math classes, math tool, plotting, math help, functions, plot functions, definite integrals, analyze functions, function plotter, extrema (maxima or minima of a function), inflection points, value table, certain values, definite integrals, intersections of functions, sine, cosine, tangent, pow, square roots, trigonometric functions and the logarithm

Now it's your time, join the completely redesigned Wingsuit Stickman experience, pack your wingsuit and glide through beautiful landscapes, cross the Alps, fly down the Rocky Mountains or enter a deadly volcano while performing insane stunts, scaring birds and plane pilots and simply enjoy the wonderful experience of a perfect wingsuit proximity flight. • From the makers of various top 100 apps like Stickman Downhill, Stickman Base Jumper, Stick Stunt Biker, Line Runner, Line Birds, Rope'n'Fly, Line Surfer, RunStickRun and more • Wingsuit Stickman is in the top 10 overall in various countries including Australia, Austria, Germany, Italy, France, UK, US, etc.. description: FREE TO DOWNLOAD AND NO SUBSCRIPTION COSTS! Clay Shooter provides all the news, views and features that a clay shooting enthusiast needs to keep up to date with what's happening on the clay circuit. Our news pages contain all the latest from the shooting associations, charity events, and our top shooters' successes in international competitions as well as practical advice on subjects like choke, ribs, cartridges, as well as advanced instruction to help you improve your scores. Clay Shooter is published 9 times a year from January to September. "There is a wealth of wonderful shooting in the UK and it’s my enviable job to get out there and find it. Along the way I have met some of the most enthusiastic and knowledgeable folks, people with a genuine love of shooting and the countryside. Sharing that knowledge and passion with others is what Clay Shooter is all about." Dom Holtam, Editor The Clay Shooter magazine app features search functionality to find key-words relating to recent content, a zoom function to enable clearer reading of selected articles and social networking integration to keep your friends up to date with all the latest shared news from the magazine. Flip your device and read the magazine in either orientation or tap the page selector to choose a specific page to fast-navigate to. You can also download and save individual pages or full editions to enjoy offline and when you are on the go. Clay Shooter is currently free to download and gives you full unlimited access to read and download each issue of the magazine for free!

It is possible to set multiple alarms For more information, please visit http://www.twomtools.com * When using the vibration function works with haptic vibration intensity.

** Currently supported in Jamaica only, please do not provide poor rating if your region is not available, we are working on extending the list of supported regions ** Fuel Finder is a community of drivers assisting each other to find the lowest gas prices available. A must have application for all drivers. Fuel Finder, at its core is a community of drivers assisting other drivers to find the lowest gas prices. The app provides other functionalities such as allowing the user to discover stations closest to them or search for stations with amenities of interest (e.g. shop, air pump, tyre services, etc.) Fuel Finder uses a crowd sourcing methodology, allowing drivers and other consumers of fuel to report the prices being paid at pumps all over Jamaica. The use of crowd sourcing gives Fuel Finder the ability to provide the most up-to-date prices Features 1. Know the actual prices of gas before you get to the pump 2. Search for gas stations you already know 3. Discover new gas stations 4. Filter gas stations to the lowest priced or closest in proximity 5. Save your favourite gas stations for quick access 6. Browse and update prices without internet connection 7. Use map feature to locate gas stations or get driving directions 8. View price statistics to analyse trends 9. Share prices with family and friends The aim of Fuel Finder is to allow drivers to discover gas stations and their current prices. With the introduction of Fuel Finder, drivers will be more informed about what is available and by extension get more value for their money at the pumps. If you enjoy using Fuel Finder, please take a minute to leave a review; It really helps other drivers discover the app.
release_text: Version 3.0.0.2 1. Fix crashes on tablets 2. Fix incorrect prices being displayed 3. Map optimization 4. Fix “Last Update” update sort with distance filter 5. Update tablet icons Version 3.0.0.1 1. Add ability to add additional fuel types to gas station. This will allow users to mark gas stations that offer Ultra Low Sulphur Diesel (ULSD) and report prices for this fuel type 2. Allow users to rate gas stations 3. Minor bug fixes

description: GET TO THE CHOPPER! What do you do when you just invaded an enemy's base and stole a helicopter? You've just commited Grand Theft Helicopter, so you take off and fly away, of course! Take control of the combat helicopter and maneuvre it to safety out of the enemy's reach in this rush inducing helicopter game. Avoid the enemy's rockets and obstacles but make sure you collect bullets along the way. You can always trade them for shield and other grand theft power ups. Your goal is to make it as far away from the enemy's base as possible. Can you handle the pressure? Grand Theft Helicopter is easy to handle - you'll get flying in no time with the easy touch controls: just tap the screen to make it go higher and release to start descending. - Cool graphics and sound will make you enjoy the game more - Shop menu - allows you to trade the Grand Theft Bullets you collect in-game for different powerups So what are you waiting for? IT'S GO TIME! Key: helicopter game, helicopter sim
